RVA.text: Bienaventurado el hombre que halla la sabiduría, Y que obtiene la inteligencia.

KJV.text: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.

WEBM.text: Happy is the man who finds wisdom, the man who gets understanding.

JFA.text: Estas coisas vos escrevo, a vós que credes no nome do Filho de Deus, para que saibais que tendes a vida eterna.

RVA.text: Estas cosas he escrito á vosotros que creéis en el nombre del Hijo de Dios, para que sepáis que tenéis vida eterna, y para que creáis en el nombre del Hijo de Dios.

KJV.text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.

WEBM.text: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.

JFA.text: Estão plantados na casa do Senhor, florescerão nos átrios do nosso Deus.

RVA.text: Plantados en la casa de Jehová, En los atrios de nuestro Dios florecerán.

KJV.text: Those that be planted in the house of the Lord shall flourish in the courts of our God.

WEBM.text: They are planted in the Lord’s house. They will flourish in our God’s courts.

JFA.text: Porque está escrito: Por minha vida, diz o Senhor, diante de mim se dobrará todo joelho, e toda língua louvará a Deus.

RVA.text: Porque escrito está: Vivo yo, dice el Señor, que á mí se doblará toda rodilla, Y toda lengua confesará á Dios.

KJV.text: For it is written, As I live, saith the Lord, every knee shall bow to me, and every tongue shall confess to God.

WEBM.text: ‘As I live,’ says the Lord, ‘to me every knee will bow. Every tongue will confess to God.’

JFA.text: A benignidade e a fidelidade se encontraram; a justiça e a paz se beijaram.

RVA.text: La misericordia y la verdad se encontraron: La justicia y la paz se besaron.

KJV.text: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

WEBM.text: Mercy and truth meet together. Righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

JFA.text: Não te apresses no teu espírito a irar-te, porque a ira abriga-se no seio dos tolos.

RVA.text: No te apresures en tu espíritu á enojarte: porque la ira en el seno de los necios reposa.

KJV.text: Be not hasty in thy spirit to be angry: for anger resteth in the bosom of fools.

WEBM.text: Don’t be hasty in your spirit to be angry, for anger rests in the bosom of fools.

JFA.text: E o testemunho é este: que Deus nos deu a vida eterna; e esta vida está em seu Filho.

RVA.text: Y este es el testimonio: Que Dios nos ha dado vida eterna; y esta vida está en su Hijo.

KJV.text: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

WEBM.text: The testimony is this, that God gave to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

JFA.text: Deleito-me em fazer a tua vontade, ó Deus meu; sim, a tua lei está dentro do meu coração.

RVA.text: El hacer tu voluntad, Dios mío, hame agradado; Y tu ley está en medio de mis entrañas.

KJV.text: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.

WEBM.text: I delight to do your will, my God. Yes, your law is within my heart.

JFA.text: Porque nós somos cooperadores de Deus; vós sois lavoura de Deus e edifício de Deus.

RVA.text: Porque nosotros, coadjutores somos de Dios; y vosotros labranza de Dios sois, edificio de Dios sois.

KJV.text: For we are labourers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.

WEBM.text: For we are God’s fellow workers. You are God’s farming, God’s building.

JFA.text: Adorai ao Senhor vestidos de trajes santos; tremei diante dele, todos os habitantes da terra.

RVA.text: Encorvaos á Jehová en la hermosura de su santuario: Temed delante de él, toda la tierra.

KJV.text: O worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.

WEBM.text: Worship the Lord in holy array. Tremble before him, all the earth.

JFA.text: Guia os mansos no que é reto, e lhes ensina o seu caminho.

RVA.text: Encaminará á los humildes por el juicio, Y enseñará á los mansos su carrera.

KJV.text: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

WEBM.text: He will guide the humble in justice. He will teach the humble his way.

JFA.text: Tempo de amar, e tempo de odiar; tempo de guerra, e tempo de paz.

RVA.text: Tiempo de amar, y tiempo de aborrecer; tiempo de guerra, y tiempo de paz.

KJV.text: A time to love, and a time to hate; a time of war, and a time of peace.

WEBM.text: A time to love, and a time to hate; a time for war, and a time for peace.

JFA.text: Amados, se Deus assim nos amou, nós também devemos amar-nos uns aos outros.

RVA.text: Amados, si Dios así nos ha amado, debemos también nosotros amarnos unos á otros.

KJV.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

WEBM.text: Beloved, if God loved us in this way, we also ought to love one another.

JFA.text: Guarda-me como à menina do olho; esconde-me, à sombra das tuas asas.

RVA.text: Guárdame como lo negro de la niñeta del ojo, Escóndeme con la sombra de tus alas.

KJV.text: Keep me as the apple of the eye, hide me under the shadow of thy wings,

WEBM.text: Keep me as the apple of your eye. Hide me under the shadow of your wings.

JFA.text: O sábio de coração aceita os mandamentos; mas o insensato palra dor cairá.

RVA.text: El sabio de corazón recibirá los mandamientos: Mas el loco de labios caerá.

KJV.text: The wise in heart will receive commandments: but a prating fool shall fall.

WEBM.text: The wise in heart accept commandments, but a chattering fool will fall.

JFA.text: Não vos enganeis; Deus não se deixa escarnecer; pois tudo o que o homem semear, isso também ceifará.

RVA.text: No os engañeis: Dios no puede ser burlado: que todo lo que el hombre sembrare, eso también segará.

KJV.text: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

WEBM.text: Don’t be deceived. God is not mocked, for whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.

JFA.text: Ouve, ó Senhor, a minha voz quando clamo; compadece-te de mim e responde-me.

RVA.text: Oye, oh Jehová, mi voz con que á ti clamo; Y ten misericordia de mí, respóndeme.

KJV.text: Hear, O Lord, when I cry with my voice: have mercy also upon me, and answer me.

WEBM.text: Hear, Lord, when I cry with my voice. Have mercy also on me, and answer me.

JFA.text: Bem-aventurados aqueles cujas iniquidades são perdoadas, e cujos pecados são cobertos.

RVA.text: Diciendo: Bienaventurados aquellos cuyas iniquidades son perdonadas, Y cuyos pecados son cubiertos.

KJV.text: Saying, Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven, and whose sins are covered.

WEBM.text: Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven, whose sins are covered.

JFA.text: O Senhor te guardará de todo o mal; ele guardará a tua vida.

RVA.text: Jehová te guardará de todo mal: El guardará tu alma.

KJV.text: The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

WEBM.text: The Lord will keep you from all evil. He will keep your soul.

JFA.text: Eu, porém, confiarei no Senhor; esperarei no Deus da minha salvação. O meu Deus me ouvirá.

RVA.text: Yo empero á Jehová esperaré, esperaré al Dios de mi salud: el Dios mío me oirá.

KJV.text: Therefore I will look unto the Lord; I will wait for the God of my salvation: my God will hear me.

WEBM.text: But as for me, I will look to the Lord. I will wait for the God of my salvation. My God will hear me.

JFA.text: Porque o Senhor dá a sabedoria; da sua boca procedem o conhecimento e o entendimento.

RVA.text: Porque Jehová da la sabiduría, Y de su boca viene el conocimiento y la inteligencia.

KJV.text: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.

WEBM.text: For the Lord gives wisdom. Out of his mouth comes knowledge and understanding.

JFA.text: Porque muitos virão em meu nome, dizendo: Eu sou o Cristo; a muitos enganarão.

RVA.text: Porque vendrán muchos en mi nombre, diciendo: Yo soy el Cristo; y á muchos engañarán.

KJV.text: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.

WEBM.text: For many will come in my name, saying, ‘I am the Christ,’ and will lead many astray.

JFA.text: Oferecei sacrifícios de justiça, e confiai no Senhor.

RVA.text: Ofreced sacrificios de justicia, Y confiad en Jehová.

KJV.text: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the Lord.

WEBM.text: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness. Put your trust in the Lord.

JFA.text: Pois Cristo é o fim da lei para justificar a todo aquele que crê.

RVA.text: Porque el fin de la ley es Cristo, para justicia á todo aquel que cree.

KJV.text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth.

WEBM.text: For Christ is the fulfillment of the law for righteousness to everyone who believes.

JFA.text: Os olhos do Senhor estão em todo lugar, vigiando os maus e os bons.

RVA.text: Los ojos de Jehová están en todo lugar, Mirando á los malos y á los buenos.

KJV.text: The eyes of the Lord are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

WEBM.text: The Lord’s eyes are everywhere, keeping watch on the evil and the good.

JFA.text: Tributai ao Senhor a glória devida ao seu nome; adorai o Senhor vestidos de trajes santos.

RVA.text: Dad á Jehová la gloria debida á su nombre: Humillaos á Jehová en el glorioso santuario.

KJV.text: Give unto the Lord the glory due unto his name; worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness.

WEBM.text: Ascribe to the Lord the glory due to his name. Worship the Lord in holy array.

JFA.text: Graça e paz vos sejam multiplicadas no pleno conhecimento de Deus e de Jesus nosso Senhor.

RVA.text: Gracia y paz os sea multiplicada en el conocimiento de Dios, y de nuestro Señor Jesús.

KJV.text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord,

WEBM.text: Grace to you and peace be multiplied in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.

JFA.text: Graça a vós, e paz da parte de Deus nosso Pai, e do Senhor Jesus Cristo.

RVA.text: Gracia sea á vosotros, y paz de Dios Padre nuestro, y del Señor Jesucristo.

KJV.text: Grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

WEBM.text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

JFA.text: Para fazeres atento à sabedoria o teu ouvido, e para inclinares o teu coração ao entendimento.

RVA.text: Haciendo estar atento tu oído á la sabiduría; Si inclinares tu corazón á la prudencia.

KJV.text: So that thou incline thine ear unto wisdom, and apply thine heart to understanding;

WEBM.text: So as to turn your ear to wisdom, and apply your heart to understanding.

JFA.text: Bendize, ó minha alma, ao Senhor, e tudo o que há em mim bendiga o seu santo nome.

RVA.text: Salmo de David. Bendice, alma mía á Jehová; Y bendigan todas mis entrañas su santo nombre.

KJV.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.

WEBM.text: Praise the Lord, my soul! All that is within me, praise his holy name!

JFA.text: Não te glories do dia de amanhã; porque não sabes o que produzirá o dia.

RVA.text: No te jactes del día de mañana; Porque no sabes qué dará de sí el día.

KJV.text: Boast not thyself of to morrow; for thou knowest not what a day may bring forth.

WEBM.text: Don’t boast about tomorrow; for you don’t now what a day may bring.

JFA.text: Se, pois, fostes ressuscitados juntamente com Cristo, buscai as coisas que são de cima, onde Cristo está assentado à destra de Deus.

RVA.text: Si habéis pues resucitado con Cristo, buscad las cosas de arriba, donde está Cristo sentado á la diestra de Dios.

KJV.text: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

WEBM.text: If then you were raised together with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated on the right hand of God.

JFA.text: Louvai ao Senhor! Louvai a Deus no seu santuário; louvai-o no firmamento do seu poder!

RVA.text: Aleluya. Alabad á Dios en su santuario: Alabadle en la extensión de su fortaleza.

KJV.text: Praise ye the Lord. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

WEBM.text: Praise the Lord! Praise God in his sanctuary! Praise him in his heavens for his acts of power!

JFA.text: Fogem os ímpios, sem que ninguém os persiga; mas os justos são ousados como o leão.

RVA.text: Huye el impío sin que nadie lo persiga: Mas el justo está confiado como un leoncillo.

KJV.text: The wicked flee when no man pursueth: but the righteous are bold as a lion.

WEBM.text: The wicked flee when no one pursues; but the righteous are as bold as a lion.

JFA.text: Ora, aconteceu certo dia que entrou num barco com seus discípulos, e disse-lhes: Passemos à outra margem do lago. E partiram. Enquanto navegavam, ele adormeceu; e desceu uma tempestade de vento sobre o lago; e o barco se enchia de água, de sorte que perigavam.

RVA.text: Y aconteció un día que él entró en un barco con sus discípulos, y les dijo: Pasemos á la otra parte del lago. Y partieron. Pero mientras ellos navegaban, él se durmió. Y sobrevino una tempestad de viento en el lago; y henchían de agua, y peligraban.

KJV.text: Now it came to pass on a certain day, that he went into a ship with his disciples: and he said unto them, Let us go over unto the other side of the lake. And they launched forth. But as they sailed he fell asleep: and there came down a storm of wind on the lake; and they were filled with water, and were in jeopardy.

WEBM.text: Now on one of those days, he entered into a boat, himself and his disciples, and he said to them, “Let’s go over to the other side of the lake.” So they launched out. But as they sailed, he fell asleep. A wind storm came down on the lake, and they were taking on dangerous amounts of water.

JFA.text: Porque para Deus somos um aroma de Cristo, nos que se salvam e nos que se perdem.

RVA.text: Porque para Dios somos buen olor de Cristo en los que se salvan, y en los que se pierden.

KJV.text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ, in them that are saved, and in them that perish:

WEBM.text: For we are a sweet aroma of Christ to God, in those who are saved, and in those who perish.

JFA.text: Com a sabedoria se edifica a casa, e com o entendimento ela se estabelece; e pelo conhecimento se encherão as câmaras de todas as riquezas preciosas e deleitáveis.

RVA.text: Con sabiduría se edificará la casa, Y con prudencia se afirmará; Y con ciencia se henchirán las cámaras De todo bien preciado y agradable.

KJV.text: Through wisdom is an house builded; and by understanding it is established: And by knowledge shall the chambers be filled with all precious and pleasant riches.

WEBM.text: Through wisdom a house is built; by understanding it is established; by knowledge the rooms are filled with all rare and beautiful treasure.

JFA.text: Cantai ao Senhor um cântico novo, cantai ao Senhor, todos os moradores da terra.

RVA.text: Cantad á Jehová canción nueva; Cantad á Jehová, toda la tierra.

KJV.text: O sing unto the Lord a new song: sing unto the Lord, all the earth.

WEBM.text: Sing to the Lord a new song! Sing to the Lord, all the earth.

JFA.text: E, entrando ele no barco, seus discípulos o seguiram. E eis que se levantou no mar tão grande tempestade que o barco era coberto pelas ondas; ele, porém, estava dormindo.

RVA.text: Y entrando él en el barco, sus discípulos le siguieron. Y he aquí, fué hecho en la mar un gran movimiento, que el barco se cubría de las ondas; mas él dormía.

KJV.text: And when he was entered into a ship, his disciples followed him. And, behold, there arose a great tempest in the sea, insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves: but he was asleep.

WEBM.text: When he got into a boat, his disciples followed him. Behold, a violent storm came up on the sea, so much that the boat was covered with the waves, but he was asleep.

JFA.text: Tu, pois, meu filho, fortifica-te na graça que há em Cristo Jesus.

RVA.text: Por lo cual te aconsejo que despiertes el don de Dios, que está en ti por la imposición de mis manos.

KJV.text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.

WEBM.text: For this cause, I remind you that you should stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands.

JFA.text: Lançando sobre ele toda a vossa ansiedade, porque ele tem cuidado de vós.

RVA.text: Echando toda vuestra solicitud en él, porque él tiene cuidado de vosotros.

KJV.text: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

WEBM.text: Casting all your worries on him, because he cares for you.

JFA.text: Compassivo e misericordioso é o Senhor; tardio em irar-se e grande em benignidade.

RVA.text: Misericordioso y clemente es Jehová; Lento para la ira, y grande en misericordia.

KJV.text: The Lord is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.

WEBM.text: The Lord is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and abundant in loving kindness.

JFA.text: Em verdade vos digo que, qualquer que não receber o reino de Deus como criança, de modo algum entrará nele.

RVA.text: De cierto os digo, que cualquiera que no recibiere el reino de Dios como un niño, no entrará en él.

KJV.text: Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein.

WEBM.text: Most certainly, I tell you, whoever doesn’t receive God’s Kingdom like a little child, he will in no way enter into it.

JFA.text: Mas a vereda dos justos é como a luz da aurora que vai brilhando mais e mais até ser dia perfeito.

RVA.text: Mas la senda de los justos es como la luz de la aurora, Que va en aumento hasta que el día es perfecto.

KJV.text: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

WEBM.text: But the path of the righteous is like the dawning light, that shines more and more until the perfect day.

JFA.text: Falando entre vós em salmos, hinos, e cânticos espirituais, cantando e salmodiando ao Senhor no vosso coração.

RVA.text: Hablando entre vosotros con salmos, y con himnos, y canciones espirituales, cantando y alabando al Señor en vuestros corazones.

KJV.text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

WEBM.text: Speaking to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs; singing, and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

JFA.text: Não sejais como o cavalo, nem como a mula, que não têm entendimento, cuja boca precisa de cabresto e freio; de outra forma não se sujeitarão.

RVA.text: No seáis como el caballo, ó como el mulo, sin entendimiento: Con cabestro y con freno su boca ha de ser reprimida, Para que no lleguen á ti.

KJV.text: Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee.

WEBM.text: Don’t be like the horse, or like the mule, which have no understanding, who are controlled by bit and bridle, or else they will not come near to you.

JFA.text: Dar-te-ei os tesouros das trevas, e as riquezas encobertas, para que saibas que eu sou o Senhor, o Deus de Israel, que te chamo pelo teu nome.

RVA.text: Y te daré los tesoros escondidos, y los secretos muy guardados; para que sepas que yo soy Jehová, el Dios de Israel, que te pongo nombre.

KJV.text: And I will give thee the treasures of darkness, and hidden riches of secret places, that thou mayest know that I, the Lord, which call thee by thy name, am the God of Israel.

WEBM.text: I will give you the treasures of darkness, and hidden riches of secret places, that you may know that it is I, Lord, who call you by your name, even the God of Israel.

JFA.text: Pelo que convinha que em tudo fosse feito semelhante a seus irmãos, para se tornar um sumo sacerdote misericordioso e fiel nas coisas concernentes a Deus, a fim de fazer propiciação pelos pecados do povo.

RVA.text: Por lo cual, debía ser en todo semejante á los hermanos, para venir á ser misericordioso y fiel Pontífice en lo que es para con Dios, para expiar los pecados del pueblo.

KJV.text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people.

WEBM.text: Therefore he was obligated in all things to be made like his brothers, that he might become a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make atonement for the sins of the people.

JFA.text: Mas o fruto do Espírito é: o amor, o gozo, a paz, a longanimidade, a benignidade, a bondade, a fidelidade. A mansidão, o domínio próprio; contra estas coisas não há lei.

RVA.text: Mas el fruto del Espíritu es: caridad, gozo, paz, tolerancia, benignidad, bondad, fe, Mansedumbre, templanza: contra tales cosas no hay ley.

KJV.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

WEBM.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith, gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

JFA.text: E, de fato, é grande fonte de lucro a piedade com o contentamento.

RVA.text: Empero grande granjería es la piedad con contentamiento.

KJV.text: But godliness with contentment is great gain.

WEBM.text: But godliness with contentment is great gain.

JFA.text: Disse-lhe Jesus: Porque me viste, creste? Bem-aventurados os que não viram e creram.

RVA.text: Dícele Jesús: Porque me has visto, Tomás, creiste: bienaventurados los que no vieron y creyeron.

KJV.text: esus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.

WEBM.text: Jesus said to him, “Because you have seen me, you have believed. Blessed are those who have not seen, and have believed.”

JFA.text: Tu me cercaste em volta, e puseste sobre mim a tua mão.

RVA.text: Detrás y delante me guarneciste, Y sobre mí pusiste tu mano.

KJV.text: Thou hast beset me behind and before, and laid thine hand upon me.

WEBM.text: You hem me in behind and before. You laid your hand on me.

JFA.text: Conta o número das estrelas, chamando-as a todas pelos seus nomes.

RVA.text: El cuenta el número de las estrellas; A todas ellas llama por sus nombres.

KJV.text: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.

WEBM.text: He counts the number of the stars. He calls them all by their names.

JFA.text: Oh! quão doces são as tuas palavras ao meu paladar! mais doces do que o mel à minha boca.

RVA.text: Cuán dulces son á mi paladar tus palabras! Más que la miel á mi boca.

KJV.text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

WEBM.text: How sweet are your promises to my taste, more than honey to my mouth!

JFA.text: Porque sabemos que, se a nossa casa terrestre deste tabernáculo se desfizer, temos de Deus um edifício, uma casa não feita por mãos, eterna, nos céus.

RVA.text: Porque sabemos, que si la casa terrestre de nuestra habitación se deshiciere, tenemos de Dios un edificio, una casa no hecha de manos, eterna en los cielos.

KJV.text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved, we have a building of God, an house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens.

WEBM.text: For we know that if the earthly house of our tent is dissolved, we have a building from God, a house not made with hands, eternal, in the heavens.

JFA.text: Ora, o Senhor é o Espírito; e onde está o Espírito do Senhor aí há liberdade.

RVA.text: Porque el Señor es el Espíritu; y donde hay el Espíritu del Señor, allí hay libertad.

KJV.text: Now the Lord is that Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.

WEBM.text: Now the Lord is the Spirit and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.

JFA.text: Portanto, assim como recebestes a Cristo Jesus, o Senhor, assim também nele andai, arraigados e edificados nele, e confirmados na fé, assim como fostes ensinados, abundando em ação de graças.

RVA.text: Por tanto, de la manera que habéis recibido al Señor Jesucristo, andad en él: Arraigados y sobreedificados en él, y confirmados en la fe, así como habéis aprendido, creciendo en ella con hacimiento de gracias.

KJV.text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him: 7 Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.

WEBM.text: As therefore you received Christ Jesus, the Lord, walk in him, rooted and built up in him, and established in the faith, even as you were taught, abounding in it in thanksgiving.

JFA.text: Ora, àquele que é poderoso para fazer tudo muito mais abundantemente além daquilo que pedimos ou pensamos, segundo o poder que em nós opera, a esse seja glória na igreja e em Cristo Jesus, por todas as gerações, para todo o sempre. Amém.

RVA.text: Y á Aquel que es poderoso para hacer todas las cosas mucho más abundantemente de lo que pedimos ó entendemos, por la potencia que obra en nosotros, A él sea gloria en la iglesia por Cristo Jesús, por todas edades del siglo de los siglos. Amén.

KJV.text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us, Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.

WEBM.text: Now to him who is able to do exceedingly abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that works in us, to him be the glory in the assembly and in Christ Jesus to all generations forever and ever. Amen.

JFA.text: Não falo de todos vós; eu conheço aqueles que escolhi; mas para que se cumprisse a escritura: O que comia do meu pão, levantou contra mim o seu calcanhar.

RVA.text: No hablo de todos vosotros: yo sé los que he elegido: mas para que se cumpla la Escritura: El que come pan conmigo, levantó contra mí su calcañar.

KJV.text: I speak not of you all: I know whom I have chosen: but that the scripture may be fulfilled, He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me.

WEBM.text: I don’t speak concerning all of you. I know whom I have chosen. But that the Scripture may be fulfilled, He who eats bread with me has lifted up his heel against me.

JFA.text: Lembro-me dos dias antigos; considero todos os teus feitos; medito na obra das tuas mãos.

RVA.text: Acordéme de los días antiguos; Meditaba en todas tus obras, Reflexionaba en las obras de tus manos.

KJV.text: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.

WEBM.text: I remember the days of old. I meditate on all your doings. I contemplate the work of your hands.

JFA.text: Arrependei-vos, pois, e convertei-vos, para que sejam apagados os vossos pecados, de sorte que venham os tempos de refrigério, da presença do Senhor, e envie ele o Cristo, que já dantes vos foi indicado, Jesus.

RVA.text: Así que, arrepentíos y convertíos, para que sean borrados vuestros pecados; pues que vendrán los tiempos del refrigerio de la presencia del Señor, Y enviará á Jesucristo, que os fué antes anunciado.

KJV.text: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord. And he shall send Jesus Christ, which before was preached unto you:

WEBM.text: Repent therefore, and turn again, that your sins may be blotted out, so that there may come times of refreshing from the presence of the Lord, and that he may send Christ Jesus, who was ordained for you before,

JFA.text: Ainda que a figueira não floresça, nem haja fruto nas vides; ainda que falhe o produto da oliveira, e os campos não produzam mantimento; ainda que o rebanho seja exterminado da malhada e nos currais não haja gado. Todavia eu me alegrarei no Senhor, exultarei no Deus da minha salvação.

RVA.text: Aunque la higuera no florecerá, Ni en las vides habrá frutos; Mentirá la obra de la oliva, Y los labrados no darán mantenimiento. Y las ovejas serán quitadas de la majada, Y no habrá vacas en los corrales; Con todo yo me alegraré en Jehová, Y me gozaré en el Dios de mi salud.

KJV.text: Although the fig tree shall not blossom, neither shall fruit be in the vines; the labour of the olive shall fail, and the fields shall yield no meat; the flock shall be cut off from the fold, and there shall be no herd in the stalls: Yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will joy in the God of my salvation.

WEBM.text: For though the fig tree doesn’t flourish, nor fruit be in the vines; the labor of the olive fails, the fields yield no food; the flocks are cut off from the fold, and there is no herd in the stalls: yet I will rejoice in the Lord. I will be joyful in the God of my salvation!

JFA.text: Eis que faço uma coisa nova; agora está saindo à luz; porventura não a percebeis? eis que porei um caminho no deserto, e rios no ermo.

RVA.text: He aquí que yo hago cosa nueva: presto saldrá á luz: ¿no la sabréis? Otra vez pondré camino en el desierto, y ríos en la soledad.

KJV.text: Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.

WEBM.text: Behold, I will do a new thing. It springs out now. Don’t you know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.

JFA.text: Temos, porém, este tesouro em vasos de barro, para que a excelência do poder seja de Deus, e não da nossa parte.

RVA.text: Tenemos empero este tesoro en vasos de barro, para que la alteza del poder sea de Dios, y no de nosotros.

KJV.text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.

WEBM.text: But we have this treasure in clay vessels, that the exceeding greatness of the power may be of God, and not from ourselves.

JFA.text: Porque, assim como o céu é mais alto do que a terra, assim são os meus caminhos mais altos do que os vossos caminhos, e os meus pensamentos mais altos do que os vossos pensamentos.

RVA.text: Como son más altos los cielos que la tierra, así son mis caminos más altos que vuestros caminos, y mis pensamientos más que vuestros pensamientos.

KJV.text: For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.

WEBM.text: For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.

JFA.text: Todavia, digo-vos a verdade, convém-vos que eu vá; pois se eu não for, o Ajudador não virá a vós; mas, se eu for, vo-lo enviarei.

RVA.text: Empero yo os digo la verdad: Os es necesario que yo vaya: porque si yo no fuese, el Consolador no vendría á vosotros; mas si yo fuere, os le enviaré.

KJV.text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.

WEBM.text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth: It is to your advantage that I go away, for if I don’t go away, the Counselor won’t come to you. But if I go, I will send him to you.

JFA.text: A qual temos como âncora da alma, segura e firme, e que penetra até o interior do véu.

RVA.text: La cual tenemos como segura y firme ancla del alma, y que entra hasta dentro del velo.

KJV.text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil;

WEBM.text: This hope we have as an anchor of the soul, a hope both sure and steadfast and entering into that which is within the veil.

JFA.text: Digo, porém: Andai pelo Espírito, e não haveis de cumprir a cobiça da carne.

RVA.text: Digo pues: Andad en el Espíritu, y no satisfagáis la concupiscencia de la carne.

KJV.text: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.

WEBM.text: But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you won’t fulfill the lust of the flesh.

JFA.text: Pois tanto o que santifica como os que são santificados, vêm todos de um só; por esta causa ele não se envergonha de lhes chamar irmãos.

RVA.text: Porque el que santifica y los que son santificados, de uno son todos: por lo cual no se avergüenza de llamarlos hermanos.

KJV.text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,

WEBM.text: For both he who sanctifies and those who are sanctified are all from one, for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brothers.

JFA.text: Sara os quebrantados de coração, e cura-lhes as feridas.

RVA.text: El sana á los quebrantados de corazón, Y liga sus heridas.

KJV.text: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

WEBM.text: He heals the broken in heart, and binds up their wounds.

JFA.text: Guarda-me como à menina do olho; esconde-me, à sombra das tuas asas.

RVA.text: Guárdame como lo negro de la niñeta del ojo, Escóndeme con la sombra de tus alas.

KJV.text: Keep me as the apple of the eye, hide me under the shadow of thy wings,

WEBM.text: Keep me as the apple of your eye. Hide me under the shadow of your wings,

JFA.text: Andarão após o Senhor; ele bramará como leão; e, bramando ele, os filhos, tremendo, virão do ocidente.

RVA.text: En pos de Jehová caminarán: él bramará como león: cual león rugirá él de cierto, y los hijos se moverán azorados del occidente.

KJV.text: They shall walk after the Lord: he shall roar like a lion: when he shall roar, then the children shall tremble from the west.

WEBM.text: They will walk after the Lord, who will roar like a lion; for he will roar, and the children will come trembling from the west.

JFA.text: Porque agora vemos como por espelho, em enigma, mas então veremos face a face; agora conheço em parte, mas então conhecerei plenamente, como também sou plenamente conhecido.

RVA.text: Ahora vemos por espejo, en obscuridad; mas entonces veremos cara á cara: ahora conozco en parte; mas entonces conoceré como soy conocido.

KJV.text: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

WEBM.text: For now we see in a mirror, dimly, but then face to face. Now I know in part, but then I will know fully, even as I was also fully known.

JFA.text: Mas agora Deus colocou os membros no corpo, cada um deles como quis.

RVA.text: Mas ahora Dios ha colocado los miembros cada uno de ellos en el cuerpo, como quiso.

KJV.text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.

WEBM.text: But now God has set the members, each one of them, in the body, just as he desired.

JFA.text: Mas tu, quando orares, entra no teu quarto e, fechando a porta, ora a teu Pai que está em secreto; e teu Pai, que vê em secreto, te recompensará.

RVA.text: Mas tú, cuando oras, éntrate en tu cámara, y cerrada tu puerta, ora á tu Padre que está en secreto; y tu Padre que ve en secreto, te recompensará en público.

KJV.text: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.

WEBM.text: But you, when you pray, enter into your inner room, and having shut your door, pray to your Father who is in secret, and your Father who sees in secret will reward you openly.

JFA.text: Mas o alimento sólido é para os adultos, os quais têm, pela prática, as faculdades exercitadas para discernir tanto o bem como o mal.

RVA.text: Mas la vianda firme es para los perfectos, para los que por la costumbre tienen los sentidos ejercitados en el discernimiento del bien y del mal.

KJV.text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age, even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil.

WEBM.text: But solid food is for those who are full grown, who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern good and evil.

JFA.text: E não somente isso, mas também gloriemo-nos nas tribulações; sabendo que a tribulação produz a perseverança, e a perseverança a experiência, e a experiência a esperança.

RVA.text: Y no sólo esto, mas aun nos gloriamos en las tribulaciones, sabiendo que la tribulación produce paciencia; Y la paciencia, prueba; y la prueba, esperanza.

KJV.text: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience; And patience, experience; and experience, hope:

WEBM.text: Not only this, but we also rejoice in our sufferings, knowing that suffering produces perseverance; and perseverance, proven character; and proven character, hope.

JFA.text: E o Verbo se fez carne, e habitou entre nós, cheio de graça e de verdade; e vimos a sua glória, como a glória do unigênito do Pai.

RVA.text: Y aquel Verbo fué hecho carne, y habitó entre nosotros (y vimos su gloria, gloria como del unigénito del Padre), lleno de gracia y de verdad.

KJV.text: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

WEBM.text: The Word became flesh, and lived among us. We saw his glory, such glory as of the one and only Son of the Father, full of grace and truth.

JFA.text: Por ele, pois, ofereçamos sempre a Deus sacrifício de louvor, isto é, o fruto dos lábios que confessam o seu nome.

RVA.text: Así que, ofrezcamos por medio de él á Dios siempre sacrificio de alabanza, es á saber, fruto de labios que confiesen á su nombre.

KJV.text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

WEBM.text: Through him, then, let us offer up a sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of lips which proclaim allegiance to his name.

JFA.text: Do mesmo modo, o reino dos céus é semelhante a um negociante que buscava boas pérolas; e encontrando uma pérola de grande valor, foi, vendeu tudo quanto tinha, e a comprou.

RVA.text: También el reino de los cielos es semejante al hombre tratante, que busca buenas perlas; Que hallando una preciosa perla, fué y vendió todo lo que tenía, y la compró.

KJV.text: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man, seeking goodly pearls: Who, when he had found one pearl of great price, went and sold all that he had, and bought it.

WEBM.text: Again, the Kingdom of Heaven is like a man who is a merchant seeking fine pearls, who having found one pearl of great price, he went and sold all that he had, and bought it.

JFA.text: Também serás uma coroa de adorno na mão do Senhor, e um diadema real na mão do teu Deus.

RVA.text: Y serás corona de gloria en la mano de Jehová, y diadema de reino en la mano del Dios tuyo.

KJV.text: Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the Lord, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.

WEBM.text: You will also be a crown of beauty in the Lord‘s hand, and a royal diadem in your God‘s hand.

JFA.text: O Senhor te abençoe e te guarde; o Senhor faça resplandecer o seu rosto sobre ti, e tenha misericórdia de ti.

RVA.text: Jehová te bendiga, y te guarde: Haga resplandecer Jehová su rostro sobre ti, y haya de ti misericordia.

KJV.text: The Lord bless thee, and keep thee: The Lord make his face shine upon thee, and be gracious unto thee:

WEBM.text: The Lord bless you, and keep you. The Lord make his face to shine on you, and be gracious to you.

JFA.text: Possais compreender, com todos os santos, qual seja a largura, e o comprimento, e a altura, e a profundidade,.

RVA.text: Podáis bien comprender con todos los santos cuál sea la anchura y la longura y la profundidad y la altura.

KJV.text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height;

WEBM.text: May be strengthened to comprehend with all the saints what is the width and length and height and depth.

JFA.text: Então Pedro, tomando a palavra, disse-lhe: Eis que nós deixamos tudo, e te seguimos; que recompensa, pois, teremos nós?

RVA.text: Entonces respondiendo Pedro, le dijo: He aquí, nosotros hemos dejado todo, y te hemos seguido: ¿qué pues tendremos?

KJV.text: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Behold, we have forsaken all, and followed thee; what shall we have therefore?

WEBM.text: Then Peter answered, “Behold, we have left everything, and followed you. What then will we have?”

JFA.text: Sendo iluminados os olhos do vosso coração, para que saibais qual seja a esperança da sua vocação, e quais as riquezas da glória da sua herança nos santos.

RVA.text: Alumbrando los ojos de vuestro entendimiento, para que sepáis cuál sea la esperanza de su vocación, y cuáles las riquezas de la gloria de su herencia en los santos.

KJV.text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

WEBM.text: Having the eyes of your hearts enlightened, that you may know what is the hope of his calling, and what are the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints.

JFA.text: Pelo que Moisés edificou um altar, ao qual chamou Jeová-Níssi.

RVA.text: Y Moisés edificó un altar, y llamó su nombre Jehová-nissi.

KJV.text: And Moses built an altar, and called the name of it Jehovahnissi:

WEBM.text: And Moses built an altar, and called the name of it Jehovahnissi

JFA.text: O Senhor aperfeiçoará o que me diz respeito. A tua benignidade, ó Senhor, dura para sempre; não abandones as obras das tuas mãos.

RVA.text: Jehová cumplirá por mí: Tu misericordia, oh Jehová, es para siempre; No dejarás la obra de tus manos.

KJV.text: The Lord will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O Lord, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.

WEBM.text: The Lord will fulfill that which concerns me; your loving kindness, Lord, endures forever. Don’t forsake the works of your own hands.

JFA.text: Arrependei-vos, porque é chegado o reino dos céus.

RVA.text: Y diciendo: Arrepentíos, que el reino de los cielos se ha acercado.

KJV.text: And saying, Repent ye: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

WEBM.text: Repent, for the Kingdom of Heaven is at hand!

JFA.text: Na verdade, entre os perfeitos falamos sabedoria, não porém a sabedoria deste mundo, nem dos príncipes deste mundo, que estão sendo reduzidos a nada; mas falamos a sabedoria de Deus em mistério, que esteve oculta, a qual Deus preordenou antes dos séculos para nossa glória.

RVA.text: Empero hablamos sabiduría de Dios entre perfectos; y sabiduría, no de este siglo, ni de los príncipes de este siglo, que se deshacen: Mas hablamos sabiduría de Dios en misterio, la sabiduría oculta, la cual Dios predestinó antes de los siglos para nuestra gloria.

KJV.text: Howbeit we speak wisdom among them that are perfect: yet not the wisdom of this world, nor of the princes of this world, that come to nought: 7 But we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery, even the hidden wisdom, which God ordained before the world unto our glory:

WEBM.text: We speak wisdom, however, among those who are full grown; yet a wisdom not of this world, nor of the rulers of this world, who are coming to nothing. But we speak God’s wisdom in a mystery, the wisdom that has been hidden, which God foreordained before the worlds for our glory.

JFA.text: Porque nada trouxe para este mundo, e nada podemos daqui levar.

RVA.text: Empero grande granjería es la piedad con contentamiento. Porque nada hemos traído á este mundo, y sin duda nada podremos sacar.

KJV.text: But godliness with contentment is great gain. For we brought nothing into this world, and it is certain we can carry nothing out.

WEBM.text: But godliness with contentment is great gain. For we brought nothing into the world, and we certainly can’t carry anything out.

JFA.text: Ora, o Deus de constância e de consolação vos dê o mesmo sentimento uns para com os outros, segundo Cristo Jesus. Para que unânimes, e a uma boca, glorifiqueis ao Deus e Pai de nosso Senhor Jesus Cristo.

RVA.text: Mas el Dios de la paciencia y de la consolación os dé que entre vosotros seáis unánimes según Cristo Jesús; Para que concordes, á una boca glorifiquéis al Dios y Padre de nuestro Señor Jesucristo.

KJV.text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.

WEBM.text: Now the God of patience and of encouragement grant you to be of the same mind one with another according to Christ Jesus, that with one accord you may with one mouth glorify the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.

JFA.text: Ele estava no princípio com Deus. Todas as coisas foram feitas por intermédio dele, e sem ele nada do que foi feito se fez.

RVA.text: Este era en el principio con Dios. Todas las cosas por él fueron hechas; y sin él nada de lo que es hecho, fué hecho.

KJV.text: The same was in the beginning with God. All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made.

WEBM.text: The same was in the beginning with God. All things were made through him. Without him was not anything made that has been made.

JFA.text: Por que gastais o dinheiro naquilo que não é pão! e o produto do vosso trabalho naquilo que não pode satisfazer? ouvi-me atentamente, e comei o que é bom, e deleitai-vos com a gordura.

RVA.text: ¿Por qué gastáis el dinero no en pan, y vuestro trabajo no en hartura? Oidme atentamente, y comed del bien, y deleitaráse vuestra alma con grosura.

KJV.text: Wherefore do ye spend money for that which is not bread? and your labour for that which satisfieth not? hearken diligently unto me, and eat ye that which is good, and let your soul delight itself in fatness.

WEBM.text: Why do you spend money for that which is not bread, and your labor for that which doesn’t satisfy? Listen diligently to me, and eat that which is good, and let your soul delight itself in richness.

JFA.text: Seja a vossa moderação conhecida de todos os homens. Perto está o Senhor.

RVA.text: Vuestra modestia sea conocida de todos los hombres. El Señor está cerca.

KJV.text: Let your moderation be known unto all men. The Lord is at hand.

WEBM.text: Let your gentleness be known to all men. The Lord is at hand.

JFA.text: Descansa no Senhor, e espera nele; não te enfades por causa daquele que prospera em seu caminho, por causa do homem que executa maus desígnios.

RVA.text: Calla á Jehová, y espera en él: No te alteres con motivo del que prospera en su camino, Por el hombre que hace maldades.

KJV.text: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

WEBM.text: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him. Don’t fret because of him who prospers in his way, because of the man who makes wicked plots happen.

JFA.text: Deleita-te também no Senhor, e ele te concederá o que deseja o teu coração.

RVA.text: Pon asimismo tu delicia en Jehová, Y él te dará las peticiones de tu corazón.

KJV.text: Delight thyself also in the Lord: and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.

WEBM.text: Also delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

JFA.text: Pareceu-me bem fazer conhecidos os sinais e maravilhas que Deus, o Altíssimo, tem feito para comigo.

RVA.text: Las señales y milagros que el alto Dios ha hecho conmigo, conviene que yo las publique.

KJV.text: I thought it good to shew the signs and wonders that the high God hath wrought toward me.

WEBM.text: It has seemed good to me to show the signs and wonders that the Most High God has worked toward me.

JFA.text: Aquietai-vos, e sabei que eu sou Deus; sou exaltado entre as nações, sou exaltado na terra.

RVA.text: Estad quietos, y conoced que yo soy Dios: Ensalzado he de ser entre las gentes, ensalzado seré en la tierra.

KJV.text: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.

WEBM.text: “Be still, and know that I am God. I will be exalted among the nations. I will be exalted in the earth.”

JFA.text: Disse-lhes Jesus: Vinde, comei. Nenhum dos discípulos ousava perguntar-lhe: Quem és tu? sabendo que era o Senhor.

RVA.text: Díceles Jesús: Venid, comed. Y ninguno de los discípulos osaba preguntarle: ¿Tú, quién eres? sabiendo que era el Señor.

KJV.text: Jesus saith unto them, Come and dine. And none of the disciples durst ask him, Who art thou? knowing that it was the Lord.

WEBM.text: Jesus said to them, “Come and eat breakfast.”None of the disciples dared inquire of him, “Who are you?” knowing that it was the Lord.

JFA.text: Porque eu estou contigo e ninguém te acometerá para te fazer mal, pois tenho muito povo nesta cidade.

RVA.text: Porque yo estoy contigo, y ninguno te podrá hacer mal; porque yo tengo mucho pueblo en esta ciudad.

KJV.text: For I am with thee, and no man shall set on thee to hurt thee: for I have much people in this city.

WEBM.text: For I am with you, and no one will attack you to harm you, for I have many people in this city.

JFA.text: E ficou ali um ano e seis meses, ensinando entre eles a palavra de Deus.

RVA.text: Y se detuvo allí un año y seis meses, enseñándoles la palabra de Dios.

KJV.text: And he continued there a year and six months, teaching the word of God among them.

WEBM.text: He lived there a year and six months, teaching the word of God among them.

JFA.text: Não vem das obras, para que ninguém se glorie.

RVA.text: No por obras, para que nadie se gloríe.

KJV.text: Not of works, lest any man should boast.

WEBM.text: Not of works, that no one would boast.

JFA.text: A mansidão, o domínio próprio; contra estas coisas não há lei.

RVA.text: Mansedumbre, templanza: contra tales cosas no hay ley.

KJV.text: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

WEBM.text: Gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

JFA.text: Portanto, nós também, pois estamos rodeados de tão grande nuvem de testemunhas, deixemos todo embaraço, e o pecado que tão de perto nos rodeia, e corramos com perseverança a carreira que nos está proposta.

RVA.text: Por tanto nosotros también, teniendo en derredor nuestro una tan grande nube de testigos, dejando todo el peso del pecado que nos rodea, corramos con paciencia la carrera que nos es propuesta.

KJV.text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,

WEBM.text: Therefore let us also, seeing we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses, lay aside every weight and the sin which so easily entangles us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us

JFA.text: Ora, estes eram mais nobres do que os de Tessalônica, porque receberam a palavra com toda avidez, examinando diariamente as Escrituras para ver se estas coisas eram assim.

RVA.text: Y fueron estós más nobles que los que estaban en Tesalónica, pues recibieron la palabra con toda solicitud, escudriñando cada día las Escrituras, si estas cosas eran así.

KJV.text: These were more noble than those in Thessalonica, in that they received the word with all readiness of mind, and searched the scriptures daily, whether those things were so.

WEBM.text: Now these were more noble than those in Thessalonica, in that they received the word with all readiness of the mind, examining the Scriptures daily to see whether these things were so.

JFA.text: Oh! quão bom e quão suave é que os irmãos vivam em união!

RVA.text: Cántico gradual: de David. ­Mirad cuán bueno y cuán delicioso es Habitar los hermanos igualmente en uno!

KJV.text: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!

WEBM.text: See how good and how pleasant it is for brothers to live together in unity!

JFA.text: Como o orvalho de Hermom, que desce sobre os montes de Sião; porque ali o Senhor ordenou a bênção, a vida para sempre.

RVA.text: Como el rocío de Hermón, Que desciende sobre los montes de Sión: Porque allí envía Jehová bendición, Y vida eterna.

KJV.text: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the Lord commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.

WEBM.text: Like the dew of Hermon, that comes down on the hills of Zion: for there the Lord gives the blessing, even life forever more.

JFA.text: É como o óleo precioso sobre a cabeça, que desceu sobre a barba, a barba de Arão, que desceu sobre a gola das suas vestes.

RVA.text: Es como el buen óleo sobre la cabeza, El cual desciende sobre la barba, La barba de Aarón, Y que baja hasta el borde de sus vestiduras.

KJV.text: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;

WEBM.text: It is like the precious oil on the head, that ran down on the beard, even Aaron’s beard; that came down on the edge of his robes;

JFA.text: Porque não temos um sumo sacerdote que não possa compadecer- se das nossas fraquezas; porém um que, como nós, em tudo foi tentado, mas sem pecado.

RVA.text: Porque no tenemos un Pontífice que no se pueda compadecer de nuestras flaquezas; mas tentado en todo según nuestra semejanza, pero sin pecado.

KJV.text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

WEBM.text: For we don’t have a high priest who can’t be touched with the feeling of our infirmities, but one who has been in all points tempted like we are, yet without sin.

JFA.text: No princípio era o Verbo, e o Verbo estava com Deus, e o Verbo era Deus.

RVA.text: Aquel era la luz verdadera, que alumbra á todo hombre que viene á este mundo.

KJV.text: That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.

WEBM.text: The true light that enlightens everyone was coming into the world.

JFA.text: Respondeu-lhe Jesus: Em verdade, em verdade te digo que se alguém não nascer de novo, não pode ver o reino de Deus.

RVA.text: Respondió Jesús, y díjole: De cierto, de cierto te digo, que el que no naciere otra vez, no puede ver el reino de Dios.

KJV.text: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

WEBM.text: Jesus answered him, “Most certainly, I tell you, unless one is born anew, he can’t see God’s Kingdom.”

JFA.text: E perseveravam na doutrina dos apóstolos e na comunhão, no partir do pão e nas orações.

RVA.text: Y perseveraban en la doctrina de los apóstoles, y en la comunión, y en el partimiento del pan, y en las oraciones.

KJV.text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.

WEBM.text: They continued steadfastly in the apostles’ teaching and fellowship, in the breaking of bread, and prayer.

JFA.text: Não em virtude de obras de justiça que nós houvéssemos feito, mas segundo a sua misericórdia, nos salvou mediante o lavar da regeneração e renovação pelo Espírito Santo.

RVA.text: No por obras de justicia que nosotros habíamos hecho, mas por su misericordia nos salvó, por el lavacro de la regeneración, y de la renovación del Espíritu Santo.

KJV.text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

WEBM.text: Not by works of righteousness, which we did ourselves, but according to his mercy, he saved us, through the washing of regeneration and renewing by the Holy Spirit.

JFA.text: Portanto, assim como por um só homem entrou o pecado no mundo, e pelo pecado a morte, assim também a morte passou a todos os homens, porquanto todos pecaram.

RVA.text: De consiguiente, vino la reconciliación por uno, así como el pecado entró en el mundo por un hombre, y por el pecado la muerte, y la muerte así pasó á todos los hombres, pues que todos pecaron.

KJV.text: Wherefore, as by one man sin entered into the world, and death by sin; and so death passed upon all men, for that all have sinned:

WEBM.text: Therefore as sin entered into the world through one man, and death through sin; and so death passed to all men, because all sinned.

JFA.text: Ao cumprir-se o dia de Pentecostes, estavam todos reunidos no mesmo lugar.

RVA.text: Y como se cumplieron los días de Pentecostés, estaban todos unánimes juntos;

KJV.text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come, they were all with one accord in one place.

WEBM.text: Now when the day of Pentecost had come, they were all with one accord in one place.

JFA.text: Se me amardes, guardareis os meus mandamentos.

RVA.text: Si me amáis, guardad mis mandamientos.

KJV.text: If ye love me, keep my commandments.

WEBM.text: If you love me, keep my commandments.

JFA.text: Ouve, ó Israel; o Senhor nosso Deus é o único Senhor.

RVA.text: Oye, Israel: Jehová nuestro Dios, Jehová uno es.

KJV.text: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God is one Lord:

WEBM.text: Hear, Israel: The Lord is our God. The Lord is one.

JFA.text: Deus é Espírito, e é necessário que os que o adoram o adorem em espírito e em verdade.

RVA.text: Dios es Espíritu; y los que le adoran, en espíritu y en verdad es necesario que adoren.

KJV.text: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

WEBM.text: God is spirit, and those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth.

JFA.text: Pois conheceis a graça de nosso Senhor Jesus Cristo, que, sendo rico, por amor de vós se fez pobre, para que pela sua pobreza fôsseis enriquecidos.

RVA.text: Porque ya sabéis la gracia de nuestro Señor Jesucristo, que por amor de vosotros se hizo pobre, siendo rico; para que vosotros con su pobreza fueseis enriquecidos.

KJV.text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

WEBM.text: For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that you through his poverty might become rich.

JFA.text: Havendo Deus antigamente falado muitas vezes, e de muitas maneiras, aos pais, pelos profetas, nestes últimos dias a nós nos falou pelo Filho, a quem constituiu herdeiro de todas as coisas, e por quem fez também o mundo.

RVA.text: DIOS, habiendo hablado muchas veces y en muchas maneras en otro tiempo á los padres por los profetas, En estos porstreros días nos ha hablado por el Hijo, al cual constituyó heredero de todo, por el cual asimismo hizo el universo.

KJV.text: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,

WEBM.text: God, having in the past spoken to the fathers through the prophets at many times and in various ways has at the end of these days spoken to us by his Son, whom he appointed heir of all things, through whom also he made the worlds.

JFA.text: Sendo ele o resplendor da sua glória e a expressa imagem do seu Ser, e sustentando todas as coisas pela palavra do seu poder, havendo ele mesmo feito a purificação dos pecados, assentou-se à direita da Majestade nas alturas.

RVA.text: El cual siendo el resplandor de su gloria, y la misma imagen de su sustancia, y sustentando todas las cosas con la palabra de su potencia, habiendo hecho la purgación de nuestros pecados por sí mismo, se sentó á la diestra de la Majestad en las alturas.

KJV.text: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high:

WEBM.text: His Son is the radiance of his glory, the very image of his substance, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purified us of our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high.

JFA.text: Vemos, porém, aquele que foi feito um pouco menor que os anjos, Jesus, coroado de glória e honra, por causa da paixão da morte, para que, pela graça de Deus, provasse a morte por todos.

RVA.text: Empero vemos coronado de gloria y de honra, por el padecimiento de muerte, á aquel Jesús que es hecho un poco menor que los ángeles, para que por gracia de Dios gustase la muerte por todos.

KJV.text: But we see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.

WEBM.text: But we see him who has been made a little lower than the angels, Jesus, because of the suffering of death crowned with glory and honor, that by the grace of God he should taste of death for everyone.

JFA.text: Portanto, visto como os filhos são participantes comuns de carne e sangue, também ele semelhantemente participou das mesmas coisas, para que pela morte derrotasse aquele que tinha o poder da morte, isto é, o Diabo.

RVA.text: Así que, por cuanto los hijos participaron de carne y sangre, él también participó de lo mismo, para destruir por la muerte al que tenía el imperio de la muerte, es á saber, al diablo.

KJV.text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

WEBM.text: Since then the children have shared in flesh and blood, he also himself in the same way partook of the same, that through death he might bring to nothing him who had the power of death, that is, the devil.

JFA.text: Tendo, portanto, um grande sumo sacerdote, Jesus, Filho de Deus, que penetrou os céus, retenhamos firmemente a nossa confissão.

RVA.text: Por tanto, teniendo un gran Pontífice, que penetró los cielos, Jesús el Hijo de Dios, retengamos nuestra profesión.

KJV.text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast our profession.

WEBM.text: Having then a great high priest, who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold tightly to our confession.

JFA.text: Pelo que deixando os rudimentos da doutrina de Cristo, prossigamos até a perfeição, não lançando de novo o fundamento de arrependimento de obras mortas e de fé em Deus.

RVA.text: Por tanto, dejando la palabra del comienzo en la doctrina de Cristo, vamos adelante á la perfección; no echando otra vez el fundamento; no arrepentimiento de obras muertas, y de la fe en Dios.

KJV.text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ, let us go on unto perfection; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works, and of faith toward God,

WEBM.text: Therefore leaving the teaching of the first principles of Christ, let us press on to perfection—not laying again a foundation of repentance from dead works, of faith toward God.

JFA.text: Porque é impossível que os que uma vez foram iluminados, e provaram o dom celestial, e se fizeram participantes do Espírito Santo.

RVA.text: Porque es imposible que los que una vez fueron iluminados y gustaron el don celestial, y fueron hechos partícipes del Espíritu Santo.

KJV.text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened, and have tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost,

WEBM.text: For concerning those who were once enlightened and tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Spirit.

JFA.text: Portanto, pode também salvar perfeitamente os que por ele se chegam a Deus, porquanto vive sempre para interceder por eles.

RVA.text: Por lo cual puede también salvar eternamente á los que por él se allegan á Dios, viviendo siempre para interceder por ellos.

KJV.text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

WEBM.text: Therefore he is also able to save to the uttermost those who draw near to God through him, seeing that he lives forever to make intercession for them.

JFA.text: E, como aos homens está ordenado morrerem uma só vez, vindo depois o juízo.

RVA.text: Y de la manera que está establecido á los hombres que mueran una vez, y después el juicio.

KJV.text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die, but after this the judgment:

WEBM.text: Inasmuch as it is appointed for men to die once, and after this, judgment.

JFA.text: Tendo pois, irmãos, ousadia para entrarmos no santíssimo lugar, pelo sangue de Jesus.

RVA.text: Así que, hermanos, teniendo libertad para entrar en el santuario por la sangre de Jesucristo.

KJV.text: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,

WEBM.text: Having therefore, brothers, boldness to enter into the holy place by the blood of Jesus.

JFA.text: Porque se voluntariamente continuarmos no pecado, depois de termos recebido o pleno conhecimento da verdade, já não resta mais sacrifício pelos pecados.

RVA.text: Porque si pecáremos voluntariamente después de haber recibido el conocimiento de la verdad, ya no queda sacrificio por el pecado.

KJV.text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth, there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins,

WEBM.text: For if we sin willfully after we have received the knowledge of the truth, there remains no more a sacrifice for sins.

JFA.text: Pela fé entendemos que os mundos foram criados pela palavra de Deus; de modo que o visível não foi feito daquilo que se vê.

RVA.text: Por la fe entendemos haber sido compuestos los siglos por la palabra de Dios, siendo hecho lo que se ve, de lo que no se veía.

KJV.text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God, so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear.

WEBM.text: By faith, we understand that the universe has been framed by the word of God, so that what is seen has not been made out of things which are visible.

JFA.text: Pelo que também de um, e esse já amortecido, descenderam tantos, em multidão, como as estrelas do céu, e como a areia inumerável que está na praia do mar.

RVA.text: Por lo cual también, de uno, y ése ya amortecido, salieron como las estrellas del cielo en multitud, y como la arena inmunerable que está á la orilla de la mar.

KJV.text: Therefore sprang there even of one, and him as good as dead, so many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable.

WEBM.text: Therefore as many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as innumerable as the sand which is by the sea shore, were fathered by one man, and him as good as dead.

JFA.text: Permaneça o amor fraternal.

RVA.text: Permanezca el amor fraternal.

KJV.text: Let brotherly love continue.

WEBM.text: Let brotherly love continue.

JFA.text: Jesus Cristo é o mesmo, ontem, e hoje, e eternamente.

RVA.text: Jesucristo es el mismo ayer, y hoy, y por los siglos.

KJV.text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

WEBM.text: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever.

JFA.text: Obedecei a vossos guias, sendo-lhes submissos; porque velam por vossas almas como quem há de prestar contas delas; para que o façam com alegria e não gemendo, porque isso não vos seria útil.

RVA.text: Obedeced á vuestros pastores, y sujetaos á ellos; porque ellos velan por vuestras almas, como aquellos que han de dar cuenta; para que lo hagan con alegría, y no gimiendo; porque esto no os es útil.

KJV.text: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit yourselves: for they watch for your souls, as they that must give account, that they may do it with joy, and not with grief: for that is unprofitable for you.

WEBM.text: Obey your leaders and submit to them, for they watch on behalf of your souls, as those who will give account, that they may do this with joy, and not with groaning, for that would be unprofitable for you.

JFA.text: Ora, o nascimento de Jesus Cristo foi assim: Estando Maria, sua mãe, desposada com José, antes de se ajuntarem, ela se achou ter concebido do Espírito Santo.

RVA.text: Y el nacimiento de Jesucristo fué así: Que siendo María su madre desposada con José, antes que se juntasen, se halló haber concebido del Espíritu Santo.

KJV.text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

WEBM.text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was like this; for after his mother, Mary, was engaged to Joseph, before they came together, she was found pregnant by the Holy Spirit.

JFA.text: Eis que a virgem conceberá e dará à luz um filho, o qual será chamado EMANUEL, que traduzido é: Deus conosco.

RVA.text: He aquí la virgen concebirá y parirá un hijo, Y llamarás su nombre Emmanuel, que declarado, es: Con nosotros Dios.

KJV.text: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

WEBM.text: “Behold, the virgin shall be with child, and shall give birth to a son. They shall call his name Immanuel”; which is, being interpreted, “God with us.”

JFA.text: Eu, na verdade, vos batizo em água, na base do arrependimento; mas aquele que vem após mim é mais poderoso do que eu, que nem sou digno de levar-lhe as alparcas; ele vos batizará no Espírito Santo, e em fogo.

RVA.text: Yo á la verdad os bautizo en agua para arrepentimiento; mas el que viene tras mí, más poderoso es que yo; los zapatos del cual yo no soy digno de llevar; él os bautizará en Espíritu Santo y en fuego.

KJV.text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance. but he that cometh after me is mightier than I, whose shoes I am not worthy to bear: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost, and with fire:

WEBM.text: I indeed baptize you in water for repentance, but he who comes after me is mightier than I, whose shoes I am not worthy to carry. He will baptize you in the Holy Spirit.

JFA.text: Então veio Jesus da Galiléia ter com João, junto do Jordão, para ser batizado por ele.

RVA.text: Entonces Jesús vino de Galilea á Juan al Jordán, para ser bautizado de él.

KJV.text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.

WEBM.text: Then Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan to John, to be baptized by him.

JFA.text: Batizado que foi Jesus, saiu logo da água; e eis que se lhe abriram os céus, e viu o Espírito Santo de Deus descendo como uma pomba e vindo sobre ele.

RVA.text: Y Jesús, después que fué bautizado, subió luego del agua; y he aquí los cielos le fueron abiertos, y vió al Espíritu de Dios que descendía como paloma, y venía sobre él.

KJV.text: And Jesus, when he was baptized, went up straightway out of the water: and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and lighting upon him:

WEBM.text: Jesus, when he was baptized, went up directly from the water: and behold, the heavens were opened to him. He saw the Spirit of God descending as a dove, and coming on him.

JFA.text: Então foi conduzido Jesus pelo Espírito ao deserto, para ser tentado pelo Diabo.

RVA.text: Entonces Jesús fué llevado del Espíritu al desierto, para ser tentado del diablo.

KJV.text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.

WEBM.text: Then Jesus was led up by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil.

JFA.text: Jesus, pois, vendo as multidões, subiu ao monte; e, tendo se assentado, aproximaram-se os seus discípulos.

RVA.text: Y viendo las gentes, subió al monte; y sentándose, se llegaron á él sus discípulos.

KJV.text: And seeing the multitudes, he went up into a mountain: and when he was set, his disciples came unto him:

WEBM.text: Seeing the multitudes, he went up onto the mountain. When he had sat down, his disciples came to him.

JFA.text: Não penseis que vim destruir a lei ou os profetas; não vim destruir, mas cumprir.

RVA.text: No penséis que he venido para abrogar la ley ó los profetas: no he venido para abrogar, sino á cumplir.

KJV.text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law, or the prophets: I am not come to destroy, but to fulfil.

WEBM.text: Don’t think that I came to destroy the law or the prophets. I didn’t come to destroy, but to fulfill.

JFA.text: Porque em verdade vos digo que, até que o céu e a terra passem, de modo nenhum passará da lei um só i ou um só til, até que tudo seja cumprido.

RVA.text: Porque de cierto os digo, que hasta que perezca el cielo y la tierra, ni una jota ni un tilde perecerá de la ley, hasta que todas las cosas sean hechas.

KJV.text: For verily I say unto you, Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.

WEBM.text: For most certainly, I tell you, until heaven and earth pass away, not even one smallest letter or one tiny pen stroke shall in any way pass away from the law, until all things are accomplished.

JFA.text: Ouvistes que foi dito aos antigos: Não matarás; e, Quem matar será réu de juízo.

RVA.text: Oísteis que fué dicho á los antiguos: No matarás; mas cualquiera que matare, será culpado del juicio.

KJV.text: Ye have heard that it was said of them of old time, Thou shalt not kill; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment:

WEBM.text: You have heard that it was said to the ancient ones, ‘You shall not murder;’ and ‘Whoever murders will be in danger of the judgment.’

JFA.text: Ouvistes que foi dito: Olho por olho, e dente por dente.

RVA.text: Oísteis que fué dicho á los antiguos: Ojo por ojo, y diente por diente.

KJV.text: Ye have heard that it hath been said, An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth:

WEBM.text: You have heard that it was said, ‘An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth.’

JFA.text: Ouvistes que foi dito: Amarás ao teu próximo, e odiarás ao teu inimigo.

RVA.text: Oísteis que fué dicho: Amarás á tu prójimo, y aborrecerás á tu enemigo.

KJV.text: Ye have heard that it hath been said, Thou shalt love thy neighbour, and hate thine enemy.

WEBM.text: You have heard that it was said, ‘You shall love your neighbor and hate your enemy.’

JFA.text: Guardai-vos de fazer as vossas boas obras diante dos homens, para serdes vistos por eles; de outra sorte não tereis recompensa junto de vosso Pai, que está nos céus.

RVA.text: Mirad que no hagáis vuestra justicia delante de los hombres, para ser vistos de ellos: de otra manera no tendréis merced de vuestro Padre que está en los cielos.

KJV.text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men, to be seen of them: otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven.

WEBM.text: Be careful that you don’t do your charitable giving before men, to be seen by them, or else you have no reward from your Father who is in heaven.

JFA.text: E, quando orardes, não sejais como os hipócritas; pois gostam de orar em pé nas sinagogas, e às esquinas das ruas, para serem vistos pelos homens. Em verdade vos digo que já receberam a sua recompensa.

RVA.text: Y cuando oras, no seas como los hipócritas; porque ellos aman el orar en las sinagogas, y en los cantones de las calles en pie, para ser vistos de los hombres: de cierto os digo, que ya tienen su pago.

KJV.text: And when thou prayest, thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are: for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.

WEBM.text: When you pray, you shall not be as the hypocrites, for they love to stand and pray in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen by men. Most certainly, I tell you, they have received their reward.

JFA.text: Portanto, orai vós deste modo: Pai nosso que estás nos céus, santificado seja o teu nome.

RVA.text: Vosotros pues, oraréis así: Padre nuestro que estás en los cielos, santificado sea tu nombre.

KJV.text: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

WEBM.text: Pray like this: ‘Our Father in heaven, may your name be kept holy.’

JFA.text: Porque, se perdoardes aos homens as suas ofensas, também vosso Pai celestial vos perdoará a vós.

RVA.text: Porque si perdonareis á los hombres sus ofensas, os perdonará también á vosotros vuestro Padre celestial.

KJV.text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you:

WEBM.text: For if you forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.

JFA.text: Não ajunteis para vós tesouros na terra; onde a traça e a ferrugem os consomem, e onde os ladrões minam e roubam.

RVA.text: No os hagáis tesoros en la tierra, donde la polilla y el orín corrompe, y donde ladronas minan y hurtan.

KJV.text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:

WEBM.text: Don’t lay up treasures for yourselves on the earth, where moth and rust consume, and where thieves break through and steal.

JFA.text: Por isso vos digo: Não estejais ansiosos quanto à vossa vida, pelo que haveis de comer, ou pelo que haveis de beber; nem, quanto ao vosso corpo, pelo que haveis de vestir. Não é a vida mais do que o alimento, e o corpo mais do que o vestuário?

RVA.text: Por tanto os digo: No os congojéis por vuestra vida, qué habéis de comer, ó que habéis de beber; ni por vuestro cuerpo, qué habéis de vestir: ¿no es la vida más que el alimento, y el cuerpo que el vestido?

KJV.text: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

WEBM.text: Therefore I tell you, don’t be anxious for your life: what you will eat, or what you will drink; nor yet for your body, what you will wear. Isn’t life more than food, and the body more than clothing?

JFA.text: Não julgueis, para que não sejais julgados.

RVA.text: No juzguéis, para que no seáis juzgados.

KJV.text: Judge not, that ye be not judged.

WEBM.text: Don’t judge, so that you won’t be judged.

JFA.text: Pois todo o que pede, recebe; e quem busca, acha; e ao que bate, abrir-se-lhe-á.

RVA.text: Porque cualquiera que pide, recibe; y el que busca, halla; y al que llama, se abrirá.

KJV.text: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.

WEBM.text: For everyone who asks receives. He who seeks finds. To him who knocks it will be opened.

JFA.text: Entrai pela porta estreita; porque larga é a porta, e espaçoso o caminho que conduz à perdição, e muitos são os que entram por ela.

RVA.text: Entrad por la puerta estrecha: porque ancha es la puerta, y espacioso el camino que lleva á perdición, y muchos son los que entran por ella.

KJV.text: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:

WEBM.text: Enter in by the narrow gate; for wide is the gate and broad is the way that leads to destruction, and many are those who enter in by it.

JFA.text: Nem todo o que me diz: Senhor, Senhor! entrará no reino dos céus, mas aquele que faz a vontade de meu Pai, que está nos céus.
