RVA.text: No todo el que me dice: Señor, Señor, entrará en el reino de los cielos: mas el que hiciere la voluntad de mi Padre que está en los cielos.

KJV.text: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

WEBM.text: Not everyone who says to me, ‘Lord, Lord,’ will enter into the Kingdom of Heaven; but he who does the will of my Father who is in heaven.

JFA.text: Todo aquele, pois, que ouve estas minhas palavras e as põe em prática, será comparado a um homem prudente, que edificou a casa sobre a rocha.

RVA.text: Cualquiera, pues, que me oye estas palabras, y las hace, le compararé á un hombre prudente, que edificó su casa sobre la peña.

KJV.text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock:

WEBM.text: Everyone therefore who hears these words of mine, and does them, I will liken him to a wise man, who built his house on a rock.

JFA.text: Mas todo aquele que ouve estas minhas palavras, e não as põe em prática, será comparado a um homem insensato, que edificou a sua casa sobre a areia.

RVA.text: Y cualquiera que me oye estas palabras, y no las hace, le compararé á un hombre insensato, que edificó su casa sobre la arena.

KJV.text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand:

WEBM.text: Everyone who hears these words of mine, and doesn’t do them will be like a foolish man, who built his house on the sand.

JFA.text: E não temais os que matam o corpo, e não podem matar a alma; temei antes aquele que pode fazer perecer no inferno tanto a alma como o corpo.

RVA.text: Y no temáis á los que matan el cuerpo, mas al alma no pueden matar: temed antes á aquel que puede destruir el alma y el cuerpo en el infierno.

KJV.text: And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

WEBM.text: Don’t be afraid of those who kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul. Rather, fear him who is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

JFA.text: Portanto, todo aquele que me confessar diante dos homens, também eu o confessarei diante de meu Pai, que está nos céus.

RVA.text: Cualquiera pues que me confesare delante de los hombres, le confesaré yo también delante de mi Padre que está en los cielos.

KJV.text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.

WEBM.text: Everyone therefore who confesses me before men, him I will also confess before my Father who is in heaven.

JFA.text: Não penseis que vim trazer paz à terra; não vim trazer paz, mas espada.

RVA.text: No penséis que he venido para meter paz en la tierra: no he venido para meter paz, sino espada.

KJV.text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword.

WEBM.text: Don’t think that I came to send peace on the earth. I didn’t come to send peace, but a sword.

JFA.text: Naquele tempo falou Jesus, dizendo: Graças te dou, ó Pai, Senhor do céu e da terra, porque ocultaste estas coisas aos sábios e entendidos, e as revelaste aos pequeninos.

RVA.text: En aquel tiempo, respondiendo Jesús, dijo: Te alabo, Padre, Señor del cielo y de la tierra, que hayas escondido estas cosas de los sabios y de los entendidos, y las hayas revelado á los niños.

KJV.text: At that time Jesus answered and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes.

WEBM.text: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants.”

JFA.text: Propôs-lhes outra parábola, dizendo: O reino dos céus é semelhante ao homem que semeou boa semente no seu campo.

RVA.text: Otra parábola les propuso, diciendo: El reino de los cielos es semejante al hombre que siembra buena simiente en su campo.

KJV.text: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field:

WEBM.text: He set another parable before them, saying, “The Kingdom of Heaven is like a man who sowed good seed in his field.”

JFA.text: Tendo Jesus chegado às regiões de Cesaréia de Felipe, interrogou os seus discípulos, dizendo: Quem dizem os homens ser o Filho do homem?

RVA.text: Y viniendo Jesús á las partes de Cesarea de Filipo, preguntó á sus discípulos, diciendo: ¿Quién dicen los hombres que es el Hijo del hombre?

KJV.text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, Whom do men say that I the Son of man am?

WEBM.text: Now when Jesus came into the parts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, “Who do men say that I, the Son of Man, am?”

JFA.text: Pois também eu te digo que tu és Pedro, e sobre esta pedra edificarei a minha igreja, e as portas do hades não prevalecerão contra ela.

RVA.text: Mas yo también te digo, que tú eres Pedro, y sobre esta piedra edificaré mi iglesia; y las puertas del infierno no prevalecerán contra ella.

KJV.text: And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.

WEBM.text: Also tell you that you are Peter, and on this rock I will build my assembly, and the gates of Hades will not prevail against it.

JFA.text: Então disse Jesus aos seus discípulos: Se alguém quer vir após mim, negue-se a si mesmo, tome a sua cruz, e siga-me.

RVA.text: Entonces Jesús dijo á sus discípulos: Si alguno quiere venir en pos de mí, niéguese á sí mismo, y tome su cruz, y sígame.

KJV.text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

WEBM.text: Then Jesus said to his disciples, “If anyone desires to come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.”

JFA.text: Ora, se teu irmão pecar, vai, e repreende-o entre ti e ele só; se te ouvir, terás ganho teu irmão.

RVA.text: Por tanto, si tu hermano pecare contra ti, ve, y redargúyele entre ti y él solo: si te oyere, has ganado á tu hermano.

KJV.text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.

WEBM.text: If your brother sins against you, go, show him his fault between you and him alone. If he listens to you, you have gained back your brother.

JFA.text: Então Pedro, aproximando-se dele, lhe perguntou: Senhor, até quantas vezes pecará meu irmão contra mim, e eu hei de perdoar? Até sete?

RVA.text: Entonces Pedro, llegándose á él, dijo: Señor, ¿cuántas veces perdonaré á mi hermano que pecare contra mí? ¿hasta siete?

KJV.text: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?

WEBM.text: Then Peter came and said to him, “Lord, how often shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? Until seven times?”

JFA.text: E eis que se aproximou dele um jovem, e lhe disse: Mestre, que bem farei para conseguir a vida eterna?

RVA.text: Y he aquí, uno llegándose le dijo: Maestro bueno, ¿qué bien haré para tener la vida eterna?

KJV.text: And, behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?

WEBM.text: Behold, one came to him and said, “Good teacher, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?”

JFA.text: Ai de vós, escribas e fariseus, hipócritas! porque dais o dízimo da hortelã, do endro e do cominho, e tendes omitido o que há de mais importante na lei, a saber, a justiça, a misericórdia e a fé; estas coisas, porém, devíeis fazer, sem omitir aquelas.

RVA.text: Ay de vosotros, escribas y Fariseos, hipócritas! porque diezmáis la menta y el eneldo y el comino, y dejasteis lo que es lo más grave de la ley, es á saber, el juicio y la misericordia y la fe: esto era menester hacer, y no dejar lo otro.

KJV.text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have omitted the weightier matters of the law, judgment, mercy, and faith: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.

WEBM.text: Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you tithe mint, dill, and cumin, and have left undone the weightier matters of the law: justice, mercy, and faith. But you ought to have done these, and not to have left the other undone.

JFA.text: E este evangelho do reino será pregado no mundo inteiro, em testemunho a todas as nações, e então virá o fim.

RVA.text: Y será predicado este evangelio del reino en todo el mundo, por testimonio á todos los Gentiles; y entonces vendrá el fin.

KJV.text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.

WEBM.text: This Good News of the Kingdom will be preached in the whole world for a testimony to all the nations, and then the end will come.

JFA.text: Porque hão de surgir falsos cristos e falsos profetas, e farão grandes sinais e prodígios; de modo que, se possível fora, enganariam até os escolhidos.

RVA.text: Porque se levantarán falsos Cristos, y falsos profetas, y darán señales grandes y prodigios; de tal manera que engañarán, si es posible, aun á los escogidos.

KJV.text: For there shall arise false Christs, and false prophets, and shall shew great signs and wonders; insomuch that, if it were possible, they shall deceive the very elect.

WEBM.text: For there will arise false christs, and false prophets, and they will show great signs and wonders, so as to lead astray, if possible, even the chosen ones.

JFA.text: Logo depois da tribulação daqueles dias, escurecerá o sol, e a lua não dará a sua luz; as estrelas cairão do céu e os poderes dos céus serão abalados.

RVA.text: Y luego después de la aflicción de aquellos días, el sol se obscurecerá, y la luna no dará su lumbre, y las estrellas caerán del cielo, y las virtudes de los cielos serán conmovidas.

KJV.text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken:

WEBM.text: But immediately after the oppression of those days, the sun will be darkened, the moon will not give its light, the stars will fall from the sky, and the powers of the heavens will be shaken.

JFA.text: Então o reino dos céus será semelhante a dez virgens que, tomando as suas lâmpadas, saíram ao encontro do noivo.

RVA.text: Entonces el reino de los cielos será semejante á diez vírgenes, que tomando sus lámparas, salieron á recibir al esposo.

KJV.text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.

WEBM.text: Then the Kingdom of Heaven will be like ten virgins, who took their lamps, and went out to meet the bridegroom.

JFA.text: Quando, pois vier o Filho do homem na sua glória, e todos os anjos com ele, então se assentará no trono da sua glória.

RVA.text: Y cuando el Hijo del hombre venga en su gloria, y todos los santos ángeles con él, entonces se sentará sobre el trono de su gloria.

KJV.text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory:

WEBM.text: But when the Son of Man comes in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then he will sit on the throne of his glory.

JFA.text: Então dirá o Rei aos que estiverem à sua direita: Vinde, benditos de meu Pai. Possuí por herança o reino que vos está preparado desde a fundação do mundo.

RVA.text: Entonces el Rey dirá á los que estarán á su derecha: Venid, benditos de mi Padre, heredad el reino preparado para vosotros desde la fundación del mundo.

KJV.text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:

WEBM.text: Then the King will tell those on his right hand, ‘Come, blessed of my Father, inherit the Kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world.’

JFA.text: E responder-lhes-á o Rei: Em verdade vos digo que, sempre que o fizestes a um destes meus irmãos, mesmo dos mais pequeninos, a mim o fizestes.

RVA.text: Y respondiendo el Rey, les dirá: De cierto os digo que en cuanto lo hicisteis á uno de estos mis hermanos pequeñitos, á mí lo hicisteis.

KJV.text: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.

WEBM.text: The King will answer them, ‘Most certainly I tell you, because you did it to one of the least of these my brothers , you did it to me.’

JFA.text: Então dirá também aos que estiverem à sua esquerda: Apartai- vos de mim, malditos, para o fogo eterno, preparado para o Diabo e seus anjos.

RVA.text: Entonces dirá también á los que estarán á la izquierda: Apartaos de mí, malditos, al fuego eterno preparado para el diablo y para sus ángeles.

KJV.text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:

WEBM.text: Then he will say also to those on the left hand, ‘Depart from me, you cursed, into the eternal fire which is prepared for the devil and his angels.’

JFA.text: E irão eles para o castigo eterno, mas os justos para a vida eterna.

RVA.text: E irán éstos al tormento eterno, y los justos á la vida eterna.

KJV.text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.

WEBM.text: These will go away into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life.

JFA.text: Enquanto comiam, Jesus tomou o pão e, abençoando-o, o partiu e o deu aos discípulos, dizendo: Tomai, comei; isto é o meu corpo.

RVA.text: Y comiendo ellos, tomó Jesús el pan, y bendijo, y lo partió, y dió á sus discípulos, y dijo: Tomad, comed. esto es mi cuerpo.

KJV.text: And as they were eating, Jesus took bread, and blessed it, and brake it, and gave it to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.

WEBM.text: As they were eating, Jesus took bread, gave thanks for it, and broke it. He gave to the disciples, and said, “Take, eat; this is my body.”

JFA.text: Cerca da hora nona, bradou Jesus em alta voz, dizendo: Eli, Eli, lamá sabactani; isto é, Deus meu, Deus meu, por que me desamparaste?

RVA.text: Y cerca de la hora de nona, Jesús exclamó con grande voz, diciendo: Eli, Eli, ¿lama sabachtani? Esto es: Dios mío, Dios mío, ¿por qué me has desamparado?

KJV.text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani? that is to say, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?

WEBM.text: About the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, “Eli, Eli, lima sabachthani?” That is, “My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?”

JFA.text: No fim do sábado, quando já despontava o primeiro dia da semana, Maria Madalena e a outra Maria foram ver o sepulcro.

RVA.text: Y la víspera de sábado, que amanece para el primer día de la semana, vino María Magdalena, y la otra María, á ver el sepulcro.

KJV.text: In the end of the sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre.

WEBM.text: Now after the Sabbath, as it began to dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary came to see the tomb.

JFA.text: Como também nos elegeu nele antes da fundação do mundo, para sermos santos e irrepreensíveis diante dele em amor.

RVA.text: Según nos escogió en él antes de la fundación del mundo, para que fuésemos santos y sin mancha delante de él en amor.

KJV.text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

WEBM.text: Even as he chose us in him before the foundation of the world, that we would be holy and without defect before him in love.

JFA.text: Em quem temos a redenção pelo seu sangue, a redenção dos nossos delitos, segundo as riquezas da sua graça.

RVA.text: En el cual tenemos redención por su sangre, la remisión de pecados por las riquezas de su gracia.

KJV.text: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

WEBM.text: In whom we have our redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace.

JFA.text: E sujeitou todas as coisas debaixo dos seus pés, e para ser cabeça sobre todas as coisas o deu à igreja.

RVA.text: Y sometió todas las cosas debajo de sus pies, y diólo por cabeza sobre todas las cosas á la iglesia.

KJV.text: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,

WEBM.text: He put all things in subjection under his feet, and gave him to be head over all things for the assembly.

JFA.text: Ele vos vivificou, estando vós mortos nos vossos delitos e pecados.

RVA.text: Y de ella recibisteis vosotros, que estabais muertos en vuestros delitos y pecados.

KJV.text: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;

WEBM.text: You were made alive when you were dead in transgressions and sins.

JFA.text: Nos quais outrora andastes, segundo o curso deste mundo, segundo o príncipe das potestades do ar, do espírito que agora opera nos filhos de desobediência.

RVA.text: En que en otro tiempo anduvisteis conforme á la condición de este mundo, conforme al príncipe de la potestad del aire, el espíritu que ahora obra en los hijos de desobediencia.

KJV.text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:

WEBM.text: In which you once walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit who now works in the children of disobedience.

JFA.text: Mas Deus, sendo rico em misericórdia, pelo seu muito amor com que nos amou, estando nós ainda mortos em nossos delitos, nos vivificou juntamente com Cristo (pela graça sois salvos).

RVA.text: Empero Dios, que es rico en misericordia, por su mucho amor con que nos amó, Aun estando nosotros muertos en pecados, nos dió vida juntamente con Cristo; por gracia sois salvos.

KJV.text: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

WEBM.text: But God, being rich in mercy, for his great love with which he loved us, even when we were dead through our trespasses, made us alive together with Christ.

JFA.text: Assim, pois, não sois mais estrangeiros, nem forasteiros, antes sois concidadãos dos santos e membros da família de Deus.

RVA.text: Así que ya no sois extranjeros ni advenedizos, sino juntamente ciudadanos con los santos, y domésticos de Dios.

KJV.text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

WEBM.text: So then you are no longer strangers and foreigners, but you are fellow citizens with the saints, and of the household of God.

JFA.text: Edificados sobre o fundamento dos apóstolos e dos profetas, sendo o próprio Cristo Jesus a principal pedra da esquina.

RVA.text: Edificados sobre el fundamento de los apóstoles y profetas, siendo la principal piedra del ángulo Jesucristo mismo.

KJV.text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;

WEBM.text: Being built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Christ Jesus himself being the chief cornerstone.

JFA.text: Pelo que, quando ledes, podeis perceber a minha compreensão do mistério de Cristo.

RVA.text: Leyendo lo cual podéis entender cuál sea mi inteligencia en el misterio de Cristo.

KJV.text: Whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)

WEBM.text: By which, when you read, you can perceive my understanding in the mystery of Christ.

JFA.text: Por esta razão dobro os meus joelhos perante o Pai.

RVA.text: Por esta causa doblo mis rodillas al Padre de nuestro Señor Jesucristo.

KJV.text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

WEBM.text: For this cause, I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.

JFA.text: Rogo-vos, pois, eu, o prisioneiro no Senhor, que andeis como é digno da vocação com que fostes chamados.

RVA.text: Yo pues, preso en el Señor, os ruego que andéis como es digno de la vocación con que sois llamados.

KJV.text: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,

WEBM.text: I therefore, the prisoner in the Lord, beg you to walk worthily of the calling with which you were called.

JFA.text: Há um só corpo e um só Espírito, como também fostes chamados em uma só esperança da vossa vocação.

RVA.text: Un cuerpo, y un Espíritu; como sois también llamados á una misma esperanza de vuestra vocación.

KJV.text: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;

WEBM.text: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as you also were called in one hope of your calling.

JFA.text: Antes, seguindo a verdade em amor, cresçamos em tudo naquele que é a cabeça, Cristo.

RVA.text: Antes siguiendo la verdad en amor, crezcamos en todas cosas en aquel que es la cabeza, a saber, Cristo.

KJV.text: But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:

WEBM.text: But speaking truth in love, we may grow up in all things into him, who is the head, Christ.

JFA.text: Portanto digo isto, e testifico no Senhor, para que não mais andeis como andam os gentios, na verdade da sua mente.

RVA.text: Esto pues digo, y requiero en el Señor, que no andéis más como los otros Gentiles, que andan en la vanidad de su sentido.

KJV.text: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,

WEBM.text: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that you no longer walk as the rest of the Gentiles also walk, in the futility of their mind.

JFA.text: E não entristeçais o Espírito Santo de Deus, no qual fostes selados para o dia da redenção.

RVA.text: Y no contristéis al Espíritu Santo de Dios, con el cual estáis sellados para el día de la redención.

KJV.text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.

WEBM.text: Don’t grieve the Holy Spirit of God, in whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.

JFA.text: Sede pois imitadores de Deus, como filhos amados.

RVA.text: Sed, pues, imitadores de Dios como hijos amados.

KJV.text: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children

WEBM.text: Be therefore imitators of God, as beloved children.

JFA.text: Ninguém vos engane com palavras vãs; porque por estas coisas vem a ira de Deus sobre os filhos da desobediência.

RVA.text: Nadie os engañe con palabras vanas; porque por estas cosas viene la ira de Dios sobre los hijos de desobediencia.

KJV.text: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.

WEBM.text: Let no one deceive you with empty words. For because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience.

JFA.text: E não vos embriagueis com vinho, no qual há devassidão, mas enchei-vos do Espírito.

RVA.text: Y no os embriaguéis de vino, en lo cual hay disolución; mas sed llenos de Espíritu.

KJV.text: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

WEBM.text: Don’t be drunken with wine, in which is dissipation, but be filled with the Spirit.

JFA.text: Tomai também o capacete da salvação, e a espada do Espírito, que é a palavra de Deus.

RVA.text: Y tomad el yelmo de salud, y la espada del Espíritu; que es la palabra de Dios.

KJV.text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

WEBM.text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God;

JFA.text: Com toda a oração e súplica orando em todo tempo no Espírito e, para o mesmo fim, vigiando com toda a perseverança e súplica, por todos os santos.

RVA.text: Orando en todo tiempo con toda deprecación y súplica en el Espíritu, y velando en ello con toda instancia y suplicación por todos los santos.

KJV.text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

WEBM.text: With all prayer and requests, praying at all times in the Spirit, and being watchful to this end in all perseverance and requests for all the saints:

JFA.text: Porque para mim o viver é Cristo, e o morrer é lucro.

RVA.text: Porque para mí el vivir es Cristo, y el morir es ganancia.

KJV.text: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

WEBM.text: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

JFA.text: De sorte que, meus amados, do modo como sempre obedecestes, não como na minha presença somente, mas muito mais agora na minha ausência, efetuai a vossa salvação com temor e tremor.

RVA.text: Por tanto, amados míos, como siempre habéis obedecido, no como en mi presencia solamente, sino mucho más ahora en mi ausencia, ocupaos en vuestra salvación con temor y temblor.

KJV.text: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.

WEBM.text: So then, my beloved, even as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.

JFA.text: Porque Deus é o que opera em vós tanto o querer como o efetuar, segundo a sua boa vontade.

RVA.text: Porque Dios es el que en vosotros obra así el querer como el hacer, por su buena voluntad.

KJV.text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

WEBM.text: For it is God who works in you both to will and to work, for his good pleasure.

JFA.text: Nada façais por contenda ou por vanglória, mas com humildade cada um considere os outros superiores a si mesmo.

RVA.text: Nada hagáis por contienda ó por vanagloria; antes bien en humildad, estimándoos inferiores los unos á los otros.

KJV.text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

WEBM.text: Doing nothing through rivalry or through conceit, but in humility, each counting others better than himself

JFA.text: Não que já a tenha alcançado, ou que seja perfeito; mas vou prosseguindo, para ver se poderei alcançar aquilo para o que fui também alcançado por Cristo Jesus.

RVA.text: No que ya haya alcanzado, ni que ya sea perfecto; sino que prosigo, por ver si alcanzo aquello para lo cual fuí también alcanzado de Cristo Jesús.

KJV.text: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.

WEBM.text: Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect; but I press on, if it is so that I may take hold of that for which also I was taken hold of by Christ Jesus.

JFA.text: Irmãos, quanto a mim, não julgo que o haja alcançado; mas uma coisa faço, e é que, esquecendo-me das coisas que atrás ficam, e avançando para as que estão adiante.

RVA.text: Hermanos, yo mismo no hago cuenta de haber lo ya alcanzado; pero una cosa hago: olvidando ciertamente lo que queda atrás, y extendiéndome á lo que está delante.

KJV.text: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before,

WEBM.text: Brothers, I don’t regard myself as yet having taken hold, but one thing I do. Forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before.

JFA.text: Mas a nossa pátria está nos céus, donde também aguardamos um Salvador, o Senhor Jesus Cristo.

RVA.text: Mas nuestra vivienda es en los cielos; de donde también esperamos al Salvador, al Señor Jesucristo.

KJV.text: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

WEBM.text: For our citizenship is in heaven, from where we also wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ.

JFA.text: Regozijai-vos sempre no Senhor; outra vez digo, regozijai- vos.

RVA.text: Gozaos en el Señor siempre: otra vez digo: Que os gocéis.

KJV.text: Rejoice in the Lord always: and again I say, Rejoice.

WEBM.text: Rejoice in the Lord always! Again I will say, “Rejoice!”

JFA.text: Pois do céu é revelada a ira de Deus contra toda a impiedade e injustiça dos homens que detêm a verdade em injustiça.

RVA.text: Porque manifiesta es la ira de Dios del cielo contra toda impiedad é injusticia de los hombres, que detienen la verdad con injusticia.

KJV.text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who hold the truth in unrighteousness;

WEBM.text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who suppress the truth in unrighteousness.

JFA.text: Porquanto, tendo conhecido a Deus, contudo não o glorificaram como Deus, nem lhe deram graças, antes nas suas especulações se desvaneceram, e o seu coração insensato se obscureceu.

RVA.text: Porque habiendo conocido á Dios, no le glorificaron como á Dios, ni dieron gracias; antes se desvanecieron en sus discursos, y el necio corazón de ellos fué entenebrecido.

KJV.text: Because that, when they knew God, they glorified him not as God, neither were thankful; but became vain in their imaginations, and their foolish heart was darkened.

WEBM.text: Because, knowing God, they didn’t glorify him as God, neither gave thanks, but became vain in their reasoning, and their senseless heart was darkened.

JFA.text: Primeiramente dou graças ao meu Deus, mediante Jesus Cristo, por todos vós, porque em todo o mundo é anunciada a vossa fé.

RVA.text: Primeramente, doy gracias á mi Dios por Jesucristo acerca de todos vosotros, de que vuestra fe es predicada en todo el mundo.

KJV.text: First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all, that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world.

WEBM.text: First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for all of you, that your faith is proclaimed throughout the whole world.

JFA.text: Pois Deus, a quem sirvo em meu espírito, no evangelho de seu Filho, me é testemunha de como incessantemente faço menção de vós.

RVA.text: Porque testigo me es Dios, al cual sirvo en mi espíritu en el evangelio de su Hijo, que sin cesar me acuerdo de vosotros siempre en mis oraciones.

KJV.text: For God is my witness, whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son, that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers

WEBM.text: For God is my witness, whom I serve in my spirit in the Good News of his Son, how unceasingly I make mention of you always in my prayers.

JFA.text: Porquanto não há distinção entre judeu e grego; porque o mesmo Senhor o é de todos, rico para com todos os que o invocam.

RVA.text: Porque no hay diferencia de Judío y de Griego: porque el mismo que es Señor de todos, rico es para con todos los que le invocan.

KJV.text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek: for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him

WEBM.text: For there is no distinction between Jew and Greek; for the same Lord is Lord of all, and is rich to all who call on him.

JFA.text: Como pois invocarão aquele em quem não creram? e como crerão naquele de quem não ouviram falar? e como ouvirão, se não há quem pregue?

RVA.text: ¿Cómo, pues invocarán á aquel en el cual no han creído? ¿y cómo creerán á aquel de quien no han oído? ¿y cómo oirán sin haber quien les predique?

KJV.text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard? and how shall they hear without a preacher?

WEBM.text: How then will they call on him in whom they have not believed? How will they believe in him whom they have not heard? How will they hear without a preacher?

JFA.text: Ora se o tropeço deles é a riqueza do mundo, e a sua diminuição a riqueza dos gentios, quanto mais a sua plenitude!

RVA.text: Y si la falta de ellos es la riqueza del mundo, y el menoscabo de ellos la riqueza de los Gentiles, ¿cuánto más el henchimiento de ellos?

KJV.text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world, and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles; how much more their fulness?

WEBM.text: Now if their fall is the riches of the world, and their loss the riches of the Gentiles; how much more their fullness?

JFA.text: Alegrai-vos com os que se alegram; chorai com os que choram.

RVA.text: Gozaos con los que se gozan: llorad con los que lloran.

KJV.text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.

WEBM.text: Rejoice with those who rejoice. Weep with those who weep.

JFA.text: Pois assim como em um corpo temos muitos membros, e nem todos os membros têm a mesma função.

RVA.text: Porque de la manera que en un cuerpo tenemos muchos miembros, empero todos los miembros no tienen la misma operación.

KJV.text: For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:

WEBM.text: For even as we have many members in one body, and all the members don’t have the same function.

JFA.text: De modo que, tendo diferentes dons segundo a graça que nos foi dada, se é profecia, seja ela segundo a medida da fé.

RVA.text: De manera que, teniendo diferentes dones según la gracia que nos es dada, si el de profecía, úsese conforme á la medida de la fe.

KJV.text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith

WEBM.text: Having gifts differing according to the grace that was given to us, if prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of our faith.

JFA.text: O amor seja não fingido. Aborrecei o mal e apegai-vos ao bem.

RVA.text: El amor sea sin fingimiento: aborreciendo lo malo, llegándoos á lo bueno.

KJV.text: Let love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.

WEBM.text: Let love be without hypocrisy. Abhor that which is evil. Cling to that which is good.

JFA.text: Toda alma esteja sujeita às autoridades superiores; porque não há autoridade que não venha de Deus; e as que existem foram ordenadas por Deus.

RVA.text: Toda alma se someta á las potestades superiores; porque no hay potestad sino de Dios; y las que son, de Dios son ordenadas.

KJV.text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers. For there is no power but of God: the powers that be are ordained of God.

WEBM.text: Let every soul be in subjection to the higher authorities, for there is no authority except from God, and those who exist are ordained by God.

JFA.text: A ninguém devais coisa alguma, senão o amor recíproco; pois quem ama ao próximo tem cumprido a lei.

RVA.text: No debáis á nadie nada, sino amaros unos á otros; porque el que ama al prójimo, cumplió la ley.

KJV.text: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.

WEBM.text: Owe no one anything, except to love one another; for he who loves his neighbor has fulfilled the law.

JFA.text: Ora, ao que é fraco na fé, acolhei-o, mas não para condenar-lhe os escrúpulos.

RVA.text: Recibid al flaco en la fe, pero no para contiendas de disputas.

KJV.text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye, but not to doubtful disputations.

WEBM.text: Now accept one who is weak in faith, but not for disputes over opinions.

JFA.text: Porquanto, tudo que dantes foi escrito, para nosso ensino foi escrito, para que, pela constância e pela consolação provenientes das Escrituras, tenhamos esperança.

RVA.text: Porque las cosas que antes fueron escritas, para nuestra enseñanza fueron escritas; para que por la paciencia, y por la consolación de las Escrituras, tengamos esperanza.

KJV.text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.

WEBM.text: For whatever things were written before were written for our learning, that through patience and through encouragement of the Scriptures we might have hope.

JFA.text: Rogo-vos, irmãos, que noteis os que promovem dissensões e escândalos contra a doutrina que aprendestes; desviai-vos deles.

RVA.text: Y os ruego hermanos, que miréis los que causan disensiones y escándalos contra la doctrina que vosotros habéis aprendido; y apartaos de ellos.

KJV.text: Salute one another with an holy kiss. The churches of Christ salute you.

WEBM.text: Now I beg you, brothers, look out for those who are causing the divisions and occasions of stumbling, contrary to the doctrine which you learned, and turn away from them.

JFA.text: Portanto, és inescusável, ó homem, qualquer que sejas, quando julgas, porque te condenas a ti mesmo naquilo em que julgas a outro; pois tu que julgas, praticas o mesmo.

RVA.text: Por lo cual eres inexcusable, oh hombre, cuaquiera que juzgas: porque en lo que juzgas á otro, te condenas á ti mismo; porque lo mismo haces, tú que juzgas.

KJV.text: Therefore thou art inexcusable, O man, whosoever thou art that judgest: for wherein thou judgest another, thou condemnest thyself; for thou that judgest doest the same things.

WEBM.text: Therefore you are without excuse, O man, whoever you are who judge. For in that which you judge another, you condemn yourself. For you who judge practice the same things.

JFA.text: E tu, ó homem, que julgas os que praticam tais coisas, cuidas que, fazendo-as tu, escaparás ao juízo de Deus?

RVA.text: ¿Y piensas esto, oh hombre, que juzgas á los que hacen tales cosas, y haces las mismas, que tú escaparás del juicio de Dios?

KJV.text: And thinkest thou this, O man, that judgest them which do such things, and doest the same, that thou shalt escape the judgment of God?

WEBM.text: Do you think this, O man who judges those who practice such things, and do the same, that you will escape the judgment of God?

JFA.text: Porquanto pelas obras da lei nenhum homem será justificado diante dele; pois o que vem pela lei é o pleno conhecimento do pecado.

RVA.text: Porque por las obras de la ley ninguna carne se justificará delante de él; porque por la ley es el conocimiento del pecado.

KJV.text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.

WEBM.text: Because by the works of the law, no flesh will be justified in his sight. For through the law comes the knowledge of sin.

JFA.text: Mas agora, sem lei, tem-se manifestado a justiça de Deus, que é atestada pela lei e pelos profetas.

RVA.text: Mas ahora, sin la ley, la justicia de Dios se ha manifestado, testificada por la ley y por los profetas.

KJV.text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets

WEBM.text: But now apart from the law, a righteousness of God has been revealed, being testified by the law and the prophets.

JFA.text: E não somente isso, mas também gloriemo-nos nas tribulações; sabendo que a tribulação produz a perseverança.

RVA.text: Y no sólo esto, mas aun nos gloriamos en las tribulaciones, sabiendo que la tribulación produce paciencia.

KJV.text: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience

WEBM.text: Not only this, but we also rejoice in our sufferings, knowing that suffering produces perseverance.

JFA.text: E a esperança não desaponta, porquanto o amor de Deus está derramado em nossos corações pelo Espírito Santo que nos foi dado.

RVA.text: Y la esperanza no avergüenza; porque el amor de Dios está derramado en nuestros corazones por el Espíritu Santo que nos es dado.

KJV.text: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

WEBM.text: And hope doesn’t disappoint us, because God’s love has been poured out into our hearts through the Holy Spirit who was given to us.

JFA.text: Pois, quando ainda éramos fracos, Cristo morreu a seu tempo pelos ímpios.

RVA.text: Porque Cristo, cuando aún éramos flacos, á su tiempo murió por los impíos.

KJV.text: For when we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly.

WEBM.text: For while we were yet weak, at the right time Christ died for the ungodly.

JFA.text: Logo muito mais, sendo agora justificados pelo seu sangue, seremos por ele salvos da ira.

RVA.text: Luego mucho más ahora, justificados en su sangre, por él seremos salvos de la ira.

KJV.text: Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.

WEBM.text: Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we will be saved from God’s wrath through him.

JFA.text: Que diremos, pois? Permaneceremos no pecado, para que abunde a graça?

RVA.text: ¿Pues qué diremos? Perseveraremos en pecado para que la gracia crezca?

KJV.text: What shall we say then? Shall we continue in sin, that grace may abound?

WEBM.text: What shall we say then? Shall we continue in sin, that grace may abound?

JFA.text: Ou, porventura, ignorais que todos quantos fomos batizados em Cristo Jesus fomos batizados na sua morte?

RVA.text: ¿O no sabéis que todos los que somos bautizados en Cristo Jesús, somos bautizados en su muerte?

KJV.text: Know ye not, that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death?

WEBM.text: Or don’t you know that all we who were baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death?

JFA.text: Fomos, pois, sepultados com ele pelo batismo na morte, para que, como Cristo foi ressuscitado dentre os mortos pela glória do Pai, assim andemos nós também em novidade de vida.

RVA.text: Porque somos sepultados juntamente con él á muerte por el bautismo; para que como Cristo resucitó de los muertos por la gloria del Padre, así también nosotros andemos en novedad de vida.

KJV.text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life.

WEBM.text: We were buried therefore with him through baptism to death, that just as Christ was raised from the dead through the glory of the Father, so we also might walk in newness of life.

JFA.text: O Espírito mesmo testifica com o nosso espírito que somos filhos de Deus.

RVA.text: Porque el mismo Espíritu da testimonio á nuestro espíritu que somos hijos de Dios.

KJV.text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:

WEBM.text: The Spirit himself testifies with our spirit that we are children of God

JFA.text: Porquanto a inclinação da carne é inimizade contra Deus, pois não é sujeita à lei de Deus, nem em verdade o pode ser.

RVA.text: Por cuanto la intención de la carne es enemistad contra Dios; porque no se sujeta á la ley de Dios, ni tampoco puede.

KJV.text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God: for it is not subject to the law of God, neither indeed can be.

WEBM.text: because the mind of the flesh is hostile towards God; for it is not subject to God’s law, neither indeed can it be.

JFA.text: Vós, porém, não estais na carne, mas no Espírito, se é que o Espírito de Deus habita em vós. Mas, se alguém não tem o Espírito de Cristo, esse tal não é dele.

RVA.text: Mas vosotros no estáis en la carne, sino en el espíritu, si es que el Espíritu de Dios mora en vosotros. Y si alguno no tiene el Espíritu de Cristo, el tal no es de él.

KJV.text: But ye are not in the flesh, but in the Spirit, if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you. Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ, he is none of his.

WEBM.text: But you are not in the flesh but in the Spirit, if it is so that the Spirit of God dwells in you. But if any man doesn’t have the Spirit of Christ, he is not his.

JFA.text: E, se o Espírito daquele que dos mortos ressuscitou a Jesus habita em vós, aquele que dos mortos ressuscitou a Cristo Jesus há de vivificar também os vossos corpos mortais, pelo seu Espírito que em vós habita.

RVA.text: Porque no siendo aún nacidos, ni habiendo hecho aún ni bien ni mal, para que el propósito de Dios conforme á la elección, no por las obras sino por el que llama, permaneciese.

KJV.text: (For the children being not yet born, neither having done any good or evil, that the purpose of God according to election might stand, not of works, but of him that calleth;)

WEBM.text: For being not yet born, neither having done anything good or bad, that the purpose of God according to election might stand, not of works, but of him who calls

JFA.text: E terás alegria e regozijo, e muitos se alegrarão com o seu nascimento.

RVA.text: Y tendrás gozo y alegría, y muchos se gozarán de su nacimiento.

KJV.text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness; and many shall rejoice at his birth.

WEBM.text: You will have joy and gladness; and many will rejoice at his birth.

JFA.text: Este será grande e será chamado filho do Altíssimo; o Senhor Deus lhe dará o trono de Davi seu pai.

RVA.text: Este será grande, y será llamado Hijo del Altísimo: y le dará el Señor Dios el trono de David su padre.

KJV.text: He shall be great, and shall be called the Son of the Highest: and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David:

WEBM.text: He will be great, and will be called the Son of the Most High. The Lord God will give him the throne of his father, David,

JFA.text: Disse então Maria: A minha alma engrandece ao Senhor.

RVA.text: Entonces María dijo: engrandece mi alma al Señor.

KJV.text: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord

WEBM.text: Mary said, “My soul magnifies the Lord.”

JFA.text: Até o pó da vossa cidade, que se nos pegou aos pés, sacudimos contra vós. Contudo, sabei isto: que o reino de Deus é chegado.

RVA.text: Aun el polvo que se nos ha pegado de vuestra ciudad á nuestros pies, sacudimos en vosotros: esto empero sabed, que el reino de los cielos se ha llegado á vosotros.

KJV.text: Even the very dust of your city, which cleaveth on us, we do wipe off against you: notwithstanding be ye sure of this, that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you.

WEBM.text: ‘Even the dust from your city that clings to us, we wipe off against you. Nevertheless know this, that God’s Kingdom has come near to you.’

JFA.text: Respondeu-lhe ele: Amarás ao Senhor teu Deus de todo o teu coração, de toda a tua alma, de todas as tuas forças e de todo o teu entendimento, e ao teu próximo como a ti mesmo.

RVA.text: Y él respondiendo, dijo: Amarás al Señor tu Dios de todo tu corazón, y de toda tu alma, y de todas tus fuerzas, y de todo tu entendimiento; y á tu prójimo como á ti mismo.

KJV.text: And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself.

WEBM.text: He answered, “You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, with all your strength, and with all your mind; and your neighbor as yourself.”

JFA.text: Ora, quando iam de caminho, entrou Jesus numa aldeia; e certa mulher, por nome Marta, o recebeu em sua casa.

RVA.text: Y aconteció que yendo, entró él en una aldea: y una mujer llamada Marta, le recibió en su casa.

KJV.text: Now it came to pass, as they went, that he entered into a certain village: and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.

WEBM.text: As they went on their way, he entered into a certain village, and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.

JFA.text: Estava Jesus em certo lugar orando e, quando acabou, disse-lhe um dos seus discípulos: Senhor, ensina-nos a orar, como também João ensinou aos seus discípulos.

RVA.text: Y acontecio que estando él orando en un lugar, como acabó, uno de sus discípulos le dijo: Señor, enséñanos á orar, como también Juan enseñó á sus discípulos.

KJV.text: And it came to pass, that, as he was praying in a certain place, when he ceased, one of his disciples said unto him, Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.

WEBM.text: When he finished praying in a certain place, one of his disciples said to him, “Lord, teach us to pray, just as John also taught his disciples.”

JFA.text: E disse ao povo: Acautelai-vos e guardai-vos de toda espécie de cobiça; porque a vida do homem não consiste na abundância das coisas que possui.

RVA.text: Y díjoles: Mirad, y guardaos de toda avaricia; porque la vida del hombre no consiste en la abundancia de los bienes que posee.

KJV.text: And he said unto them, Take heed, and beware of covetousness: for a man's life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth.

WEBM.text: He said to them, “Beware! Keep yourselves from covetousness, for a man’s life doesn’t consist of the abundance of the things which he possesses.”

JFA.text: Não, eu vos digo; antes, se não vos arrependerdes, todos de igual modo perecereis.

RVA.text: No, os digo; antes si no os arrepintiereis, todos pereceréis igualmente.

KJV.text: I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.

WEBM.text: I tell you, no, but unless you repent, you will all perish in the same way.

JFA.text: Se alguém vier a mim, e não aborrecer a pai e mãe, a mulher e filhos, a irmãos e irmãs, e ainda também à própria vida, não pode ser meu discípulo.

RVA.text: Si alguno viene á mí, y no aborrece á su padre, y madre, y mujer, é hijos, y hermanos, y hermanas, y aun también su vida, no puede ser mi discípulo.

KJV.text: If any man come to me, and hate not his father, and mother, and wife, and children, and brethren, and sisters, yea, and his own life also, he cannot be my disciple.

WEBM.text: “If anyone comes to me, and doesn’t disregard his own father, mother, wife, children, brothers, and sisters, yes, and his own life also, he can’t be my disciple.”

JFA.text: E tomando pão, e havendo dado graças, partiu-o e deu-lho, dizendo: Isto é o meu corpo, que é dado por vós; fazei isto em memória de mim.

RVA.text: Y tomando el pan, habiendo dado gracias, partió, y les dió, diciendo: Esto es mi cuerpo, que por vosotros es dado: haced esto en memoria de mí.

KJV.text: And he took bread, and gave thanks, and brake it, and gave unto them, saying, This is my body which is given for you: this do in remembrance of me.

WEBM.text: He took bread, and when he had given thanks, he broke it, and gave to them, saying, “This is my body which is given for you. Do this in memory of me.”

JFA.text: Jesus, porém, dizia: Pai, perdoa-lhes; porque não sabem o que fazem. Então repartiram as vestes dele, deitando sortes sobre elas.

RVA.text: Y Jesús decía: Padre, perdónalos, porque no saben lo que hacen. Y partiendo sus vestidos, echaron suertes.

KJV.text: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.

WEBM.text: Jesus said, “Father, forgive them, for they don’t know what they are doing.” Dividing his garments among them, they cast lots.

JFA.text: Respondeu-lhe Jesus: Em verdade te digo que hoje estarás comigo no paraíso.

RVA.text: Entonces Jesús le dijo: De cierto te digo, que hoy estarás conmigo en el paraíso.

KJV.text: And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, Today shalt thou be with me in paradise.

WEBM.text: Jesus said to him, “Assuredly I tell you, today you will be with me in Paradise.”

JFA.text: Olhai as minhas mãos e os meus pés, que sou eu mesmo; apalpai-me e vede; porque um espírito não tem carne nem ossos, como percebeis que eu tenho.

RVA.text: Mirad mis manos y mis pies, que yo mismo soy: palpad, y ved; que el espíritu ni tiene carne ni huesos, como veis que yo tengo.

KJV.text: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.

WEBM.text: See my hands and my feet, that it is truly me. Touch me and see, for a spirit doesn’t have flesh and bones, as you see that I have.

JFA.text: Depois lhe disse: São estas as palavras que vos falei, estando ainda convosco, que importava que se cumprisse tudo o que de mim estava escrito na Lei de Moisés, nos Profetas e nos Salmos.

RVA.text: Y él les dijo: Estas son las palabras que os hablé, estando aún con vosotros: que era necesario que se cumpliesen todas las cosas que están escritas de mí en la ley de Moisés, y en los profetas, y en los salmos.

KJV.text: And he said unto them, These are the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and in the prophets, and in the psalms, concerning me.

WEBM.text: He said to them, “This is what I told you, while I was still with you, that all things which are written in the law of Moses, the prophets, and the psalms, concerning me must be fulfilled.”

JFA.text: Ora, Jesus, ao começar o seu ministério, tinha cerca de trinta anos; sendo (como se cuidava) filho de José, filho de Eli.

RVA.text: Y el mismo Jesús comenzaba á ser como de treinta años, hijo de José, como se creía; que fué hijo de Elí.

KJV.text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age, being (as was supposed) the son of Joseph, which was the son of Heli

WEBM.text: Jesus himself, when he began to teach, was about thirty years old, being the son (as was supposed) of Joseph, the son of Heli

JFA.text: Jesus, pois, cheio do Espírito Santo, voltou do Jordão; e era levado pelo Espírito no deserto.

RVA.text: Y Jesus, lleno del Espíritu Santo, volvió del Jordán, y fué llevado por el Espíritu al desierto.

KJV.text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness

WEBM.text: Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness

JFA.text: Então, levantando ele os olhos para os seus discípulos, dizia: Bem-aventurados vós, os pobres, porque vosso é o reino de Deus.

RVA.text: Y alzando él los ojos á sus discípulos, decía: Bienaventurados vosotros los pobres; porque vuestro es el reino de Dios.

KJV.text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples, and said, Blessed be ye poor: for yours is the kingdom of God.

WEBM.text: He lifted up his eyes to his disciples, and said, “Blessed are you who are poor, God’s Kingdom is yours.”

JFA.text: Assim como quereis que os homens vos façam, do mesmo modo lhes fazei vós também.

RVA.text: Y como queréis que os hagan los hombres, así hacedles también vosotros.

KJV.text: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.

WEBM.text: “As you would like people to do to you, do exactly so to them.”

JFA.text: Dai, e ser-vos-á dado; boa medida, recalcada, sacudida e transbordando vos deitarão no regaço; porque com a mesma medida com que medis, vos medirão a vós.

RVA.text: Dad, y se os dará; medida buena, apretada, remecida, y rebosando darán en vuestro seno: porque con la misma medida que midiereis, os será vuelto á medir.

KJV.text: Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.

WEBM.text: “Give, and it will be given to you: good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over, will be given to you. For with the same measure you measure it will be measured back to you.”

JFA.text: E por que me chamais: Senhor, Senhor, e não fazeis o que eu vos digo?

RVA.text: ¿Por qué me llamáis, Señor, Señor, y no hacéis lo que digo?

KJV.text: And why call ye me, Lord, Lord, and do not the things which I say?

WEBM.text: “Why do you call me, ‘Lord, Lord,’ and don’t do the things which I say?”

JFA.text: Em seguida dizia a todos: Se alguém quer vir após mim, negue-se a si mesmo, tome cada dia a sua cruz, e siga-me.

RVA.text: Y decía á todos: Si alguno quiere venir en pos de mí, niéguese á sí mismo, y tome su cruz cada día, y sígame.

KJV.text: And he said to them all, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.

WEBM.text: He said to all, “If anyone desires to come after me, let him deny himself, take up his cross, and follow me.”

JFA.text: Respondeu-lhes: A vós não vos compete saber os tempos ou as épocas, que o Pai reservou à sua própria autoridade.

RVA.text: Y les dijo: No toca á vosotros saber los tiempos ó las sazones que el Padre puso en su sola potestad.

KJV.text: And he said unto them, It is not for you to know the times or the seasons, which the Father hath put in his own power.

WEBM.text: He said to them, “It isn’t for you to know times or seasons which the Father has set within his own authority.”

JFA.text: Então Pedro, tomando a palavra, disse: Na verdade reconheço que Deus não faz acepção de pessoas.

RVA.text: Entonces Pedro, abriendo su boca, dijo: Por verdad hallo que Dios no hace acepción de personas.

KJV.text: Then Peter opened his mouth, and said, Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons

WEBM.text: Peter opened his mouth and said, “Truly I perceive that God doesn’t show favoritism.”

JFA.text: Enquanto Pedro ainda dizia estas coisas, desceu o Espírito Santo sobre todos os que ouviam a palavra.

RVA.text: Estando aún hablando Pedro estas palabras, el Espíritu Santo cayó sobre todos los que oían el sermón.

KJV.text: While Peter yet spake these words, the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word.

WEBM.text: While Peter was still speaking these words, the Holy Spirit fell on all those who heard the word.

JFA.text: Confirmando as almas dos discípulos, exortando-os a perseverarem na fé, dizendo que por muitas tribulações nos é necessário entrar no reino de Deus.

RVA.text: Confirmando los ánimos de los discípulos, exhortándoles á que permaneciesen en la fe, y que es menester que por muchas tribulaciones entremos en el reino de Dios.

KJV.text: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.

WEBM.text: confirming the souls of the disciples, exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that through many afflictions we must enter into God’s Kingdom.

JFA.text: O Deus que fez o mundo e tudo o que nele há, sendo ele Senhor do céu e da terra, não habita em templos feitos por mãos de homens.

RVA.text: El Dios que hizo el mundo y todas las cosas que en él hay, éste, como sea Señor del cielo y de la tierra, no habita en templos hechos de manos.

KJV.text: God that made the world and all things therein, seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth, dwelleth not in temples made with hands;

WEBM.text: The God who made the world and all things in it, he, being Lord of heaven and earth, doesn’t dwell in temples made with hands.

JFA.text: E de um só fez todas as raças dos homens, para habitarem sobre toda a face da terra, determinando-lhes os tempos já dantes ordenados e os limites da sua habitação.

RVA.text: Y de una sangre ha hecho todo el linaje de los hombres, para que habitasen sobre toda la faz de la tierra; y les ha prefijado el orden de los tiempos, y los términos de los habitación de ellos.

KJV.text: And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth, and hath determined the times before appointed, and the bounds of their habitation;

WEBM.text: He made from one blood every nation of men to dwell on all the surface of the earth, having determined appointed seasons, and the boundaries of their dwellings.

JFA.text: Mas Deus, não levando em conta os tempos da ignorância, manda agora que todos os homens em todo lugar se arrependam.

RVA.text: Empero Dios, habiendo disimulado los tiempos de esta ignorancia, ahora denuncia á todos los hombres en todos los lugares que se arrepientan.

KJV.text: And the times of this ignorance God winked at; but now commandeth all men every where to repent:

WEBM.text: The times of ignorance therefore God overlooked. But now he commands that all people everywhere should repent.

JFA.text: Porquanto determinou um dia em que com justiça há de julgar o mundo, por meio do varão que para isso ordenou; e disso tem dado certeza a todos, ressuscitando-o dentre os mortos.

RVA.text: Por cuanto ha establecido un día, en el cual ha de juzgar al mundo con justicia, por aquel varón al cual determinó; dando fe á todos con haberle levantado de los muertos.

KJV.text: Because he hath appointed a day, in the which he will judge the world in righteousness by that man whom he hath ordained; whereof he hath given assurance unto all men, in that he hath raised him from the dead.

WEBM.text: Because he has appointed a day in which he will judge the world in righteousness by the man whom he has ordained; of which he has given assurance to all men, in that he has raised him from the dead.

JFA.text: E acontecerá nos últimos dias, diz o Senhor, que derramarei do meu Espírito sobre toda a carne; e os vossos filhos e as vossas filhas profetizarão, os vossos mancebos terão visões, os vossos anciãos terão sonhos.

RVA.text: Y será en los postreros días, dice Dios, Derramaré de mi Espíritu sobre toda carne, Y vuestros hijos y vuestras hijas profetizarán; Y vuestros mancebos verán visiones, Y vuestros viejos soñarán sueños.

KJV.text: And it shall come to pass in the last days, saith God, I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh: and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, and your young men shall see visions, and your old men shall dream dreams:

WEBM.text: It will be in the last days, says God, that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh. Your sons and your daughters will prophesy. Your young men will see visions. Your old men will dream dreams.

JFA.text: E todos ficaram cheios do Espírito Santo, e começaram a falar noutras línguas, conforme o Espírito lhes concedia que falassem.

RVA.text: Y fueron todos llenos del Espíritu Santo, y comenzaron á hablar en otras lenguas, como el Espíritu les daba que hablasen.

KJV.text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance.

WEBM.text: They were all filled with the Holy Spirit, and began to speak with other languages, as the Spirit gave them the ability to speak.

JFA.text: Arrependei-vos, pois, e convertei-vos, para que sejam apagados os vossos pecados, de sorte que venham os tempos de refrigério, da presença do Senhor.

RVA.text: Así que, arrepentíos y convertíos, para que sean borrados vuestros pecados; pues que vendrán los tiempos del refrigerio de la presencia del Señor.

KJV.text: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord.

WEBM.text: Repent therefore, and turn again, that your sins may be blotted out, so that there may come times of refreshing from the presence of the Lord

JFA.text: Respondendo Pedro e os apóstolos, disseram: Importa antes obedecer a Deus que aos homens.

RVA.text: Y respondiendo Pedro y los apóstoles, dijeron: Es menester obedecer á Dios antes que á los hombres.

KJV.text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.

WEBM.text: But Peter and the apostles answered, “We must obey God rather than men.”

JFA.text: As mulheres idosas, semelhantemente, que sejam reverentes no seu viver, não caluniadoras, não dadas a muito vinho, mestras do bem.

RVA.text: Las viejas, asimismo, se distingan en un porte santo; no calumniadoras, no dadas á mucho vino, maestras de honestidad.

KJV.text: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;

WEBM.text: And that older women likewise be reverent in behavior, not slanderers nor enslaved to much wine, teachers of that which is good;.

JFA.text: Adverte-lhes que estejam sujeitos aos governadores e autoridades, que sejam obedientes, e estejam preparados para toda boa obra.

RVA.text: Amonéstales que se sujeten á los príncipes y potestades, que obedezcan, que estén prontos á toda buena obra.

KJV.text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,

WEBM.text: Remind them to be in subjection to rulers and to authorities, to be obedient, to be ready for every good work.

JFA.text: E dizendo: "O tempo está cumprido, e é chegado o reino de Deus. Arrependei-vos, e crede no evangelho."

RVA.text: Y diciendo: El tiempo es cumplido, y el reino de Dios está cerca: arrepentíos, y creed al evangelio.

KJV.text: And saying, The time is fulfilled, and the kingdom of God is at hand: repent ye, and believe the gospel.

WEBM.text: And saying, “The time is fulfilled, and God’s Kingdom is at hand! Repent, and believe in the Good News.”

JFA.text: E aconteceu naqueles dias que veio Jesus de Nazaré da Galiléia, e foi batizado por João no Jordão.

RVA.text: Y aconteció en aquellos días, que Jesús vino de Nazaret de Galilea, y fué bautizado por Juan en el Jordán.

KJV.text: And it came to pass in those days, that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was baptized of John in Jordan.

WEBM.text: In those days, Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was baptized by John in the Jordan.

JFA.text: Amarás, pois, ao Senhor teu Deus de todo o teu coração, de toda a tua alma, de todo o teu entendimento e de todas as tuas forças.

RVA.text: Amarás pues al Señor tu Dios de todo tu corazón, y de toda tu alma, y de toda tu mente, y de todas tus fuerzas; este es el principal mandamiento.

KJV.text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind, and with all thy strength: this is the first commandment.

WEBM.text: You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, and with all your soul, and with all your mind, and with all your strength.

JFA.text: E se a tua mão te fizer tropeçar, corta-a; melhor é entrares na vida aleijado, do que, tendo duas mãos, ires para o inferno, para o fogo que nunca se apaga.

RVA.text: Y si tu mano te escandalizare, córtala: mejor te es entrar á la vida manco, que teniendo dos manos ir á la Gehenna, al fuego que no puede ser apagado.

KJV.text: And if thy hand offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed, than having two hands to go into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:

WEBM.text: If your hand causes you to stumble, cut it off. It is better for you to enter into life maimed, rather than having your two hands to go into hell, into the unquenchable fire,

JFA.text: E tudo quanto fizerdes por palavras ou por obras, fazei-o em nome do Senhor Jesus, dando por ele graças a Deus Pai.

RVA.text: Y todo lo que hacéis, sea de palabra, ó de hecho, hacedlo todo en el nombre del Señor Jesús, dando gracias á Dios Padre por él.

KJV.text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.

WEBM.text: Whatever you do, in word or in deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father, through him.

JFA.text: Acontecerá depois que derramarei o meu Espírito sobre toda a carne; vossos filhos e vossas filhas profetizarão, os vossos anciãos terão sonhos, os vossos mancebos terão visões.

RVA.text: Y será que después de esto, derramaré mi Espíritu sobre toda carne, y profetizarán vuestros hijos y vuestras hijas; vuestros viejos soñarán sueños, y vuestros mancebos verán visiones.

KJV.text: And it shall come to pass afterward, that I will pour out my spirit upon all flesh; and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, your old men shall dream dreams, your young men shall see visions:

WEBM.text: It will happen afterward, that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh; and your sons and your daughters will prophesy. Your old men will dream dreams. Your young men will see visions.

JFA.text: Diante dele um fogo consome, e atrás dele uma chama abrasa; a terra diante dele é como o jardim do Édem mas atrás dele um desolado deserto; sim, nada lhe escapa.

RVA.text: Delante de él consumirá fuego, tras de él abrasará llama; como el huerto de Edén será la tierra delante de él, y detrás de él como desierto asolado; ni tampoco habrá quien de él escape.

KJV.text: A fire devoureth before them; and behind them a flame burneth: the land is as the garden of Eden before them, and behind them a desolate wilderness; yea, and nothing shall escape them.

WEBM.text: A fire devours before them, and behind them, a flame burns. The land is as the garden of Eden before them, and behind them, a desolate wilderness. Yes, and no one has escaped them.

JFA.text: Portanto, cingindo os lombos do vosso entendimento, sede sóbrios, e esperai inteiramente na graça que se vos oferece na revelação de Jesus Cristo.

RVA.text: Por lo cual, teniendo los lomos de vuestro entendimiento ceñidos, con templanza, esperad perfectamente en la gracia que os es presentada cuando Jesucristo os es manifestado.

KJV.text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;

WEBM.text: Therefore prepare your minds for action, be sober, and set your hope fully on the grace that will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ

JFA.text: Porque para isso fostes chamados, porquanto também Cristo padeceu por vós, deixando-vos exemplo, para que sigais as suas pisadas.

RVA.text: Porque para esto sois llamados; pues que también Cristo padeció por nosotros, dejándonos ejemplo, para que vosotros sigáis sus pisadas.

KJV.text: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

WEBM.text: For to this you were called, because Christ also suffered for us, leaving you an example, that you should follow his steps,

JFA.text: Semelhantemente vós, mulheres, sede submissas a vossos maridos; para que também, se alguns deles não obedecem à palavra, sejam ganhos sem palavra pelo procedimento de suas mulheres.

RVA.text: Asimismo vosotras, mujeres, sed sujetas á vuestros maridos; para que también los que no creen á la palabra, sean ganados sin palabra por la conversación de sus mujeres.

KJV.text: Likewise, ye wives, be in subjection to your own husbands; that, if any obey not the word, they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives;

WEBM.text: In the same way, wives, be in subjection to your own husbands; so that, even if any don’t obey the Word, they may be won by the behavior of their wives without a word;

JFA.text: Servindo uns aos outros conforme o dom que cada um recebeu, como bons despenseiros da multiforme graça de Deus.

RVA.text: Cada uno según el don que ha recibido, adminístrelo á los otros, como buenos dispensadores de las diferentes gracias de Dios.

KJV.text: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.

WEBM.text: As each has received a gift, employ it in serving one another, as good managers of the grace of God in its various forms.

JFA.text: Os quais hão de dar conta ao que está preparado para julgar os vivos e os mortos.

RVA.text: Los cuales darán cuenta al que está aparejado para juzgar los vivos y los muertos.

KJV.text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.

WEBM.text: Who will give account to him who is ready to judge the living and the dead.

JFA.text: Porque a profecia nunca foi produzida por vontade dos homens, mas os homens da parte de Deus falaram movidos pelo Espírito Santo.

RVA.text: Porque la profecía no fué en los tiempos pasados traída por voluntad humana, sino los santos hombres de Dios hablaron siendo inspirados del Espíritu Santo.

KJV.text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man: but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost.

WEBM.text: For no prophecy ever came by the will of man: but holy men of God spoke, being moved by the Holy Spirit.

JFA.text: E à ciência o domínio próprio, e ao domínio próprio a perseverança, e à perseverança a piedade.

RVA.text: Y en la ciencia templanza, y en la templanza paciencia, y en la paciencia temor de Dios.

KJV.text: And to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness;

WEBM.text: And in knowledge, self-control; and in self-control patience; and in patience godliness;

JFA.text: E à piedade a fraternidade, e à fraternidade o amor.

RVA.text: Y en el temor de Dios, amor fraternal, y en el amor fraternal caridad.

KJV.text: And to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.

WEBM.text: And in godliness brotherly affection; and in brotherly affection, love.

JFA.text: Mas houve também entre o povo falsos profetas, como entre vós haverá falsos mestres, os quais introduzirão encobertamente heresias destruidoras, negando até o Senhor que os resgatou, trazendo sobre si mesmos repentina destruição.

RVA.text: Pero hubo también falsos profetas en el pueblo, como habrá entre vosotros falsos doctores, que introducirán encubiertamente herejías de perdición, y negarán al Señor que los rescató, atrayendo sobre sí mismos perdición acelerada.

KJV.text: But there were false prophets also among the people, even as there shall be false teachers among you, who privily shall bring in damnable heresies, even denying the Lord that bought them, and bring upon themselves swift destruction.

WEBM.text: But false prophets also arose among the people, as false teachers will also be among you, who will secretly bring in destructive heresies, denying even the Master who bought them, bringing on themselves swift destruction.

JFA.text: Antes crescei na graça e no conhecimento de nosso Senhor e Salvador Jesus Cristo. A ele seja dada a glória, assim agora, como até o dia da eternidade.

RVA.text: Mas creced en la gracia y conocimiento de nuestro Señor y Salvador Jesucristo. A él sea gloria ahora y hasta el día de la eternidad. Amén.

KJV.text: But grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and for ever. Amen.

WEBM.text: But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. To him be the glory both now and forever. Amen.

JFA.text: Mas vós, amados, não ignoreis uma coisa: que um dia para o Senhor é como mil anos, e mil anos como um dia.

RVA.text: Mas, oh amados, no ignoréis esta una cosa: que un día delante del Señor es como mil años y mil años como un día.

KJV.text: But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.

WEBM.text: But don’t forget this one thing, beloved, that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.

JFA.text: O Senhor não retarda a sua promessa, ainda que alguns a têm por tardia; porém é longânimo para convosco, não querendo que ninguém se perca, senão que todos venham a arrepender-se.

RVA.text: El Señor no tarda su promesa, como algunos la tienen por tardanza; sino que es paciente para con nosotros, no queriendo que ninguno perezca, sino que todos procedan al arrepentimiento.

KJV.text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

WEBM.text: The Lord is not slow concerning his promise, as some count slowness; but is patient with us, not wishing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

JFA.text: Não matarás.

RVA.text: No matarás.

KJV.text: Thou shalt not kill.

WEBM.text: You shall not murder.

JFA.text: Não furtarás.

RVA.text: No hurtarás.

KJV.text: Thou shalt not steal.

WEBM.text: You shall not steal.

JFA.text: Não farás para ti imagem esculpida, nem figura alguma do que há em cima no céu, nem em baixo na terra, nem nas águas debaixo da terra.

RVA.text: No te harás imagen, ni ninguna semejanza de cosa que esté arriba en el cielo, ni abajo en la tierra, ni en las aguas debajo de la tierra.

KJV.text: Thou shalt not make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing that is in heaven above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the water under the earth.

WEBM.text: You shall not make for yourselves an idol, nor any image of anything that is in the heavens above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the water under the earth:

JFA.text: Lembra-te do dia do sábado, para o santificar.

RVA.text: Acordarte has del día del reposo, para santificarlo.

KJV.text: Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.

WEBM.text: Remember the Sabbath day, to keep it holy.

JFA.text: Respondeu Deus a Moisés: EU SOU O QUE SOU. Disse mais: Assim dirás aos olhos de Israel: EU SOU me enviou a vós.

RVA.text: Y respondió Dios á Moisés: YO SOY EL QUE SOY. Y dijo: Así dirás á los hijos de Israel: YO SOY me ha enviado á vosotros.

KJV.text: And God said unto Moses, I Am That I Am: and he said, Thus shalt thou say unto the children of Israel, I Am hath sent me unto you.

WEBM.text: God said to Moses, “I AM WHO I AM,” and he said, “You shall tell the children of Israel this: ‘I AM has sent me to you.’”

JFA.text: Rogo-vos, irmãos, em nome de nosso Senhor Jesus Cristo, que sejais concordes no falar, e que não haja dissensões entre vós; antes sejais unidos no mesmo pensamento e no mesmo parecer.

RVA.text: Os ruego pues, hermanos, por el nombre de nuestro Señor Jesucristo, que habléis todos una misma cosa, y que no haya entre vosotros disensiones, antes seáis perfectamente unidos en una misma mente y en un mismo parecer.

KJV.text: Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and that there be no divisions among you; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

WEBM.text: Now I beg you, brothers, through the name of our Lord, Jesus Christ, that you all speak the same thing and that there be no divisions among you, but that you be perfected together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

JFA.text: Pois, assim como a mulher veio do homem, assim também o homem nasce da mulher, mas tudo vem de Deus.

RVA.text: Porque como la mujer es del varón, así también el varón es por la mujer: empero todo de Dios.

KJV.text: For as the woman is of the man, even so is the man also by the woman; but all things of God.

WEBM.text: For as woman came from man, so a man also comes through a woman; but all things are from God.

JFA.text: Porque, assim como o corpo é um, e tem muitos membros, e todos os membros do corpo, embora muitos, formam um só corpo, assim também é Cristo.

RVA.text: Porque de la manera que el cuerpo es uno, y tiene muchos miembros, empero todos los miembros del cuerpo, siendo muchos, son un cuerpo, así también Cristo.

KJV.text: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
